title: MDA Avaz Reader: Reading made fun and easier
description:
MDA Avaz Reader is a reading app that offers exciting stories and evidence-based support to kids of all ages. It is a great tool to develop their reading fluency and independent reading.

The app can be a kid‚Äôs reading buddy, providing hints and help every step of the way. It‚Äôs a fun way to expand their vocabulary while they discover the joy of reading.

With MDA Avaz Reader, students can read their textbooks by importing PDFs or taking photos of the books. This promotes reading comprehension resulting in better academic performance.

Try MDA Avaz Reader free for 14 days & choose from our affordable subscription plans to continue using all of its exciting features.

+ Key features
- Download exciting books from within the app
- Import a PDF document quickly to your library
- No active internet connection required after download
- Share your already-reviewed pages with other Avaz Reader users
- Easily customize settings
- Seamless keyboard integration for reviewing
- User-friendly buttons for simple understanding
- Prompt support on mail and chat
- Real-life text analysis
- High-quality text-to-speech feature
- Screen-masking to aid focusing
- Synchronized highlighting of text
- Hints available as rhyming words and images
- Colored overlays to assist readers with Irlen Syndrome
- Breaking down words into syllables
- Word families based on syllables
- Configurable speed and progress
- Independent and assisted user flows

Why use MDA Avaz Reader?

+ Use books you already have
Use any age-appropriate books. You do not need any special PDFs or web resources and can add a page by simply capturing an image with text in it. Several pages can also be added at the same time.

+ Download exciting stories
Download stories for all reading levels from within the app. The compelling stories with captivating images motivate young children to read.

+ Hints to encourage reading
When the child finds it difficult to read a particular word, they can tap the Hint button. This ensures that the child is not discouraged by a new or seemingly difficult word. Additionally, the use of Hints will also stimulate phonemic and conceptual understanding. A variety of Hints available on the app are -
- Rhyming words and images
- Word family hints
- Hints for starting, middle and end blends

+ Builds comprehension skills
The Build feature helps in parsing the sentences in the text and focusing on the smaller syntactic units. This enables children to comprehend the text more effectively.

+ Promotes stress-free reading
There are three different reader views on the app.
- Page view shows the entire page
- Sentence view shows only one sentence at a time
- Word view shows just one word

+ Promotes distraction-free reading
- Use Plain-text mode to remove background images to show only bare text
- The Focus button highlights a single line on the page which contains the current word to read. This maintains the child's visual focus on the highlighted word, and helps avoid visual over stimulation.

+ Enables finger-reading
The pencil icon on the reading page helps track the words they are reading.This lowers convergence difficulties while aiding hand-eye coordination. The pointer can be easily re-positioned by double-tapping the new word.

MDA Avaz Reader is developed by Avaz, the team behind the award-winning AAC app for individuals with speech-related difficulties, in collaboration with the Madras Dyslexia Association(MDA). The app built based on 20+ years of research carried out by the reputed MDA, employs several reading comprehension strategies that enable kids to read better.

Download MDA Avaz Reader now and enable your child to get better at reading, while they read independently.

We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any query or feedback, please email us at support@avazapp.com.

title: Special Words
description:
Achieve educational milestones with our award-winning app designed for speech and language development. An invaluable app for visual learners that is adaptable to children‚Äôs individual needs and abilities.

Children, parents, teachers and professionals in 100+ countries and 27+ languages are using Special Words to turn screen time into an active and engaging learning experience.


Areas of Development
‚Ä¢ Enhance communication, language and literacy skills
‚Ä¢ Increase sight-word vocabulary
‚Ä¢ Encourage listening and speaking skills
‚Ä¢ Develop hand-eye coordination
‚Ä¢ Improve fine motor skills


Personalize to Suit Abilities
‚Ä¢ Use your own text and photos to harness interests and personalize activities
‚Ä¢ Include your voice or audio to bring the learning experience to life
‚Ä¢ Create word lists tailored to children‚Äôs learning needs
‚Ä¢ Adjustable animation speed to suit abilities and concentration levels
‚Ä¢ Activities adaptable to any developmental stage and for adults with learning difficulties and memory impairment
‚Ä¢ Can be fully customized to grow with a child as they develop


Share Your Words
‚Ä¢ Copy content to and from the app on another device
‚Ä¢ Exchange word lists using Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Dropbox, Google Drive or email
‚Ä¢ Transfer content to and from our Special Stories app to extend the learning process


Accessible For All
‚Ä¢ Support for switch users
‚Ä¢ Choice of fonts, plus a large text option to support those with visual impairments and dyslexia
‚Ä¢ Use at home, school, in speech or occupational therapy sessions, and for home schooling to follow the curriculum and enhance learning
‚Ä¢ Proven to be accessible and hold the attention of children with a variety of abilities and skill sets
‚Ä¢ Compatible with Android tablets and phones, and Chromebooks
	

Differences between Special Words and Special Words Pro
For teachers and speech & language professionals, the professional edition (Special Words Pro) includes extra features not in the standard edition (Special Words):
‚Ä¢ Printable PDF assessment sheets
‚Ä¢ Printable cards to use in paper-based activities
‚Ä¢ Free access to curriculum-related content
‚Ä¢ Dual control using external keyboard


Speak Your Language
‚Ä¢ Special Words includes 96 pictures, spoken words and written text in 27 languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Croatian, Dutch, English (American, British and Australian), Finnish, Flemish, French, German, Hindi, Icelandic, Italian, Luxembourgish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and Welsh
‚Ä¢ All languages use audio provided from native speakers
‚Ä¢ Replace words and re-record audio in any other language your child uses


Why Our Apps Are Different
‚Ä¢ Visually clear and simple, with no distracting backgrounds or noises
‚Ä¢ Tested and recommended by Down syndrome and ASD experts and organisations around the world
‚Ä¢ No in-app purchases, pop-up ads or user tracking
‚Ä¢ Developed in collaboration with parents, professionals and teachers of children with special educational needs


Part of the Special iApps Family
Special iApps is a multi-award-winning non-profit social enterprise with a worldwide reputation for creating educational apps for those with learning disabilities and additional needs, as well as in early years education.  They initially created apps to teach their youngest son William, who has Down syndrome and autism, now they support children internationally.

Discover more of our apps on Google Play or visit www.specialiapps.org.

title: Anguis
description:
In this game, you make a snake of words in both English or Dutch.

The game is using open dyslexic font, a font made specially for people with dyslexia. 
To make it nicer for people with dyslexia to play the game. 

In 2015 13 year old Joppe made this android game made with the help of his father.
In 2020 they made it a multi-language application. 

(Joppe learned to program at CoderDojo Gent)

comments: I love this game, but, they only allow you 12 free tickets every 40 minutes or so. It costs at least 4 tickets to play 4 cards in a round. So, this 12 tickets yet burned up pretty fast. And, who wants to stop playing and have to exit the game and wait 40 minutes for more tickets??? It's a hassle! So, when you run out of tickets, they offer in ad purchases to buy more tickets, and that's where they get you. I have not found a bingo game that is actually free to play. It's a shame!!!

ADDICTED!!!!!! I wish you would put an option in to use our coins to be able to buy at least 10 tickets. I'm a poor 49 year old with a son who plays 2 sports a senior in high school and a daughter who just graduated college and needed a reliable car. So I gave her mine, since she's an elementary school teacher and needs to mold the minds of the future game designer's who will take your jobs in the future..... Damn sorry to ramble on, let me buy tickets with coins. Respectfully, A broke Dad. Lol

Playing higher level now. Fun, but having fewer bingos, than when I had played for the first time. The reason I stopped this game, before, was cause I got tired of seeming to be forced to buy things to progress. I became angry an frustrated. Time will tell if I put up with this for long. Hate to stop. But I will. Their second chance will end. Will update.

By far the best bingo game I've played! The tutorial when starting the game is very helpful. So many options for avatar and dauber. The voice call outs are different from room to room which makes it more entertaining. The leveling up rewards are great. Not interrupted with ads. Not required to spend money (available if you want to). Only drawback is that your account doesn't work on multiple devices.

This is the only Bingo app I play. You don't have to use real money if you can't afford to. The graphics are neat and there's lots of 'rooms' to play. One of my favorite things is how all the callers sound different. Some times there are one or two callers that have a thick accent, but it's easy to watch the 'boards foe which number is called.

comments: I have to downgrade my initial rating of this game, since it stopped functioning correctly. It no longer connects to Facebook, giving me a message that I've been "signed off," even though when I go into the Facebook app or ANY of my browsers, I'm signed into Facebook. Worse, the Windows 10 app doesn't work, either. Support told me to take steps I've already taken, then finally said they were "fixing it in the next update," which was supposed to drop this week...and hasn't, of course.

I love this game I have played it on and off for that last 10 plus years. I love how they always come up with new and exciting ways to keep you in the game. I just wish there was more ways of getting enough credits to continue to play when like myself tonight has not had such good luck and not gotten 1 bingo but I don't have any more credits so I'm done for the night until tomorrow when I get my daily ones

I love this game and have been playing it for years. But over the past couple of weeks it's been kicking me out. There is definatly something wrong with the app and I hope you fix it soon. I have uninstalled it and reinstalled it several times and each time it glitches at different areas. I have lost alot of game points because it has glitched in the middle of a game and i wasnt reimbursed. This comment has been up for 10 days, without ANY response from the game makers! PLEASE FIX ASAP!!

Horrible. Game has really gone downhill. You used to be able to unlock cities by level up so if you could play any of them. Now you can't move from a city unless you get those stupid figure things and it's near impossible to get. You can never get bingo and good luck getting a treasure chest with the figure. You can't even play slots anymore. It was an amazing game and now it's just horrible.

Would be 5-star if it wasn't so darn hard to earn bingo chips without purchases. I love the game and games within it, and look forward to my free stuff each day. It's nice to play a game that is entirely free though when you download a free game, hence my 4-star review.

title: Skillz - Logic Brain Games
description:
Want to test your memory skills or give your brain an exercise? Try this fun memory game to improve your memory, speed, get better accuracy, distinguish between colors and much more. This is a fun logical game that gives a good test to your brain.

With this brain game, you can help players to learn to distinguish between different colors and improve their skills. The players sharpen their minds while having fun playing this game. This logical game is a skill test game. Also, you can test your reflexes. There are some fun game puzzles in the game of different kinds. You score points and advance levels. Very fun and addictive game that you will completely enjoy.

***********************
APP HIGHLIGHTS
***********************
To add to playing a logical game and training your brain, you also have a lot of fun with the game. It is packed with different kind of tests that improve your skills and abilities. Here is how ‚Äì 
‚úìImprove your memory
‚úìTrain your reflexes
‚úìIncrease your accuracy
‚úìProve your touch ability
‚úìIncrease your speed
‚úìLearn color coordination

Each level tests your skills and abilities to their peak. After each level, your results are ranked between 1 and 5 Stars and you will be rewarded with a number of Brains. For every Star earned you will be rewarded with one Brain. Using a brain, you can retry from the current round, pass a round or pass a level with 5 stars.
	
Every level is designed to help you improve your skills, memory to sharpen your mind with this addictive game. So, are you ready to take up a brain challenge now? Download this free app ‚Äì ‚ÄúSkillz Logical Brain Game‚Äù now to get started.

The logical game is introducing a Multiplayer feature. Here is how it goes ‚Äì
- Play with your friends or with random players
- Start a game with minimum 2 players. Max limit is 4.
- If you finish the game in Multiplayer mode on the 1st place, you earn a "Win" and 5 Brains. If you finish the game but on the 2nd place, you earn just 3 Brains and no "Win"
- Your Multiplayer Ranking depends on the "Wins"
- Play in Multiplayer mode and unlock Achievements
You will love the feature, so start sharing with your friends.

title: Capt'n Hippocampus' Spelling C
description:
Oh no! Capt‚Äôn Hippocampus is going on account and he‚Äôll give no quarter! Unfortunately, he‚Äôs missing a few thing: a ship and a crew, for instance! But there‚Äôs a solution: he can take his raft to the letter islands and recover the word treasure. This treasure will make him incredibly rich, mainly in knowledge and experience, so that he can rescue his crew from the grip of the sinister sea monster Analphabetus and buy himself a ship.

Captain Hippocampus' Spelling C is a game adapted to kids learning to read and speak but learners of all ages can enjoy it and have fun while learning intuitively and independently.

It's time for English! Learn how to pronounce and to write English words as well as words from other languages (see list below). You can learn how to read and how to speak. This is the free version.
Can learning to read be as easy and exciting as playing a computer game? We've developed a game with which you can learn to read intuitively and individually, as you would play a game.
We believe that a learning game has to be so good that it would encourage you to play it even though you might not be interested in its pedagogical content. We've done our best to implement this idea in our game. In doing so, we incorporate psycho-pedagogical foundations and concepts from the Montessori method, improve upon such tools as phonetic charts and present the syllables as they are actually spoken and not as they would be if spoken separately. Our emphasis is not on learning to recite the alphabet or spelling out words; on the contrary, instead of learning the ABC off by heart, the pupil learns which sounds actually occur in each word. As such, double vowels, for instance, are never separated.

Should you have any further questions about our pedagogical method or about the game itself, please feel free to contact us at: info@regentropfen.org 

The game is adapted for children aged 4 to 8, regardless of whether the pupil goes to school, kindergarten, pre-school or primary school. Children in higher grade may also profit from the game in case of various reading and/or spelling difficulties such as dyslexia. You can also use the game to learn some basics of foreign languages, regardless of your age: thanks to the audio clips, you can discover learn the pronunciation of the individual phonemes in each word. Similarly to the  Pimsleur method, you hence not only learn a translation of the word, but have a native speaker show you the meaning and the spelling of each word. Of course, this is not meant to be a complete linguistic pedagogical environment: the words offered are all nouns and there are as of yet no adjectives, verbs and no punctuation. Learning the language is based here on a challenging speaking vocabulary trainer. This app however can be used as an interactive introduction to the acquisition of speaking skills for individual words. The game does not contain a dictionary and is not split up in individual lessons, but rather in levels with various themes such as pirates, animals or vehicles.

Contains: English, German, French, Spanish, Hindi, Chinese, Russian, Indonesian, Italian, Turkish, Polish, Danish, Swedish, Bulgarian, Catalan, Georgian, Slovak, Czech, Hungarian, Greek

title: GraphoGame American English Phonics
description:
Set your child or classroom up for reading success! GraphoGame helps kindergarten and primary school children learn to read and spell their first letters, syllables and words in English. Academically validated content and no ads!



FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ Avatar creation & customization

‚Ä¢ Engaging 3D graphics

‚Ä¢ Suitable for ages 6-9

‚Ä¢ Works offline

‚Ä¢ No ads or hidden fees

‚Ä¢ Engaging & systematic phonics game that complements any phonics programme 

‚Ä¢ Developed in collaboration with prestigious organizations such as Haskins Laboratories (United States), University of Cambridge Centre for Neuroscience in Education (United Kingdom) and University of Jyv√§skyl√§ (Finland)

‚Ä¢ Designed for school and home use 

GraphoGame helps kids learn letters, rhymes and their sounds through a variety of engaging 3D levels ‚Äì all with your child‚Äôs own unique avatar that keeps them coming back for more! The player gradually moves from graphemes and phonemes, through syllables and rhymes, to eventually learn how to blend what they have learned into complete words. By playing just 15 minutes sessions regularly, kids can improve their letter knowledge, phonological awareness, reading speed and overall confidence in literacy.

This American English version of GraphoGame is the result of the work done by Haskins Laboratories, a private, not-for-profit research institute founded in 1935, investigating the biological basis of speech, language and reading, and their related disabilities. GraphoGame is based on decades of research in dyslexia, neurolinguistics and neuropsychology by the University of Jyv√§skyl√§ in Finland and adapted to English by the University of Cambridge Centre for Neuroscience in Education








Game icon ¬© Grapho Group Oy, Ville M√∂nkk√∂nen & Mika Halttunen

title: Word Cookies!¬Æ
description:
üç™ Here come some tasty Word Cookies hot out of the oven! Take a bite! üç™ 
Word Cookies is an addictive cross between all the word games you love! With so many exciting challenges, you'll soon be obsessed with testing your spelling and vocabulary limits to make as many words as you can!

HOW TO PLAY
‚Ä¢ Swipe the alphabet cookies on the baking pan to spell words.

SPECIAL FEATURES

comments: Great game. Very suspicious when routinely you get to the third level of tournament play and tend to always lose by approximately 200 points. This is especially if you are not choosing to watch the videos. Another concern is the daily wheel- and this is not just an issue I noticed- you never get more than 20 coins no matter what. How many sections are there on the wheel? 8, 10? odds would make it so you would land on each piece every 8 to 10 days.you wouldn't go a year without getting over 20

This is not a bad word game. But I wonder why I have never ever on the wheel spun and stopped on the 50 coins?!!!! ALWAYS the SMALL ones.....5, 10, 1 or whatever that very small one is!! I've been playing long enough to have at least once or twice stopped on something LARGE!! And pls don't tell me it's according to how I spin. Is there something you can do re this? Thank you.... Barbara Felton

The game is very addictive and fun to play. I love how it gives you so many things to do so you never get bored! For example: There's quests, special events, league, levels and daily levels. But what's unique about this ios game is that their's barely any ads! Overall, I think this game is very fun and I recommend you install it if you have'nt already.

We have played the game for years, and do enjoy the challenges. Sometimes you have words that no one in normal life would recognize, but that's where good ol' phonics comes in. But why, recently, have you changed the daily spin rewards to only 10 or 15 coins ( with a rare hint or a 20)? I've seen others comment on this, and a promise to look into it, but it doesn't seem to be getting back to the old way.

I love the game BUT lately it stalls when ads pop-up and they will not go away eventho I allow them to play out. I have uninstalled several times and reinstalled to no avail. Most of the ads are USELESS to me as I am retired, will not be starting a business and/or cannot use a RX card because I have Medicare Advantage insurance. Very irritating! 10/29/2020 UPDATE: New tablet and can now play the game with no problems. Highly recommend.

title: Scrabble¬Æ GO - New Word Game
description:
Welcome to Scrabble GO, the free new and updated version of the classic word game!
‚≠êYour winning word awaits!‚≠ê
 
Classic Scrabble Game with New Word Game Features
Official Scrabble board ‚û§ Custom word tiles ‚û§ Scrabble dictionary ‚û§ Authentic crossword game experience
 
Play with Friends and Family
Easily find new Scrabble friends ‚û§ Challenge your friends ‚û§ Use our fun and easy-to-use chat emojis & phrases to chat with friends & family  
 
New Word Games - Move beyond the traditional scrabble board with 4 fast-paced competitive game modes!
1.       Duels - Fast-Paced, head-to-head Scrabble game! Play 5 turns against players of similar skill. Watch out for the timer and unlock Scrabble prize chests.
2.       Word Drop - New word search game. Used word tiles are replaced with new custom tiles, opening new crossword game possibilities!
3.       Tumbler - Like anagrams? Find as many high-scoring words from a rotating set of letters in a limited amount of time.
4.       Rush - Challenge yourself in this Solo Scrabble mode, set up high-scoring plays on a smaller 11x11 scrabble board.
‚≠êPlay the updated version of the classic word game as a free to play mobile game‚≠ê
 
Collect Playable Word Tiles
Play Scrabble GO and personalize the classic scrabble experience with custom word tiles! Unlock chests to discover and collect a variety of new tiles! New and limited-edition tiles are added often, so be sure to collect them all!
 
Scrabble Game Features
‚û§Scrabble Leagues - Play against other Scrabble friends to achieve top league rankings to get more XP and chests as well as an exclusive League Frame to show off your progress.
‚û§Practice Mode - Play Scrabble 1-on-1 against the computer. Designed to match your skill level, it‚Äôs a great way to test out new strategies and tactics.
‚û§Boosts - Powerful word game boosts like Hint, Upgrade, Word Spy, and Vortex help take your gameplay to the next level.
‚û§Track Stats - View your scoring averages, longest words, best plays, and more!  See how your word puzzle Scrabble skills are progressing with our in-depth profile page or visit another player‚Äôs profile.
‚û§Level up & Unlock more - Unlock new collectible Scrabble tiles and other features by scoring points in Scrabble games and Duels, or by ranking high on the Arena leaderboards!
 
Privacy Policy:
http://scopely.com/privacy/

Like Scrabble GO on Facebook!  https://www.facebook.com/ScrabbleGO/

recentChanges:
Scrabble lovers get ready for the most exciting Scrabble tiles yet!
- NEW FEATURE - Tile Masters!
--- Take your Scrabble tiles to the next level with new evolving tiles

comments: I have a love/hate relationship with this game. I love the various types of games. There's so much to play and the puzzles beyond scrabble are fun. I hate the implementation of ads. There's so many! I could cope if they all had the same format, but these fullscreen ads all have the 'X' in different places. I find the interface too cluttered, bright and confusing. There's too much going on and it makes it difficult to navigate. The animations for rewards are too long and frequent. Get rid!

The game itself is fine. Works well etc. However, it seems to be a meet up place for middle aged to senior men. They all start out polite, how are you etc but within a few exchanges, they want you to go on WhatsApp or hangouts. Some of us would just like to play Scrabble! I seriously have turned down, at least, 15 to 20 men. It's not a dating app.

This game is vile and takes away from the true spirit of scrabble. Players cheat by using hints which they are pathetic enough to pay for. You cant progress in the mini games without paying. The graphics are an eyesore, the adverts are constant (unless youre willing to pay of course). The 'Bots' who im guessing dont have an agenda, as they aren't real people can take ages to take their turn. This game is a disgrace and does not encourage people to use their own minds, to learn or play for free.

This game is a fun way to pass the time, but it can be frustrating at times. I tap on the "swap tiles" icon because I had about 4 letters that were the same. I look at an ad (I don't want to see) so that I can swap out my tiles, and they literally give me back the same exact tiles I had before. This is the 3rd time this has happened. Also, they don't allow us to use all the words in the dictionary. I know we cant use proper nouns, but there are other words we should be able to use.

I love playing Scrabble. It's a lot of fun. The reviews are right there are tons of ads. Most of them are 5 seconds. And you can choose longer ones to get more rewards sometimes. There's a chat feature that can be fun when talking to friends. Or maybe people who you played a lot of games with already. But there are a lot of people that are scammers that are trying to chat. And when you realize that and try to end a game with them it wrecks your winning streak.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Mystery Manor: hidden objects
description:
Welcome to the Manor, detective! Ready to start your investigation?

It looks like we have a problem that only you can help us with. The owner of Mystery Manor, the enigmatic and elusive Mister X, has disappeared, leaving the residents all to themselves to solve all the mysteries of this strange place. This is where you come in, detective.

Despite the fa√ßade, there are many rooms full of hidden objects and dark secrets in this mansion. Each floor is a labyrinth of mysterious cases that will intrigue any detective worth his salt. Experience the rush of investigating uncanny crime scenes, questioning unusual characters, and finding clues in the most unexpected places!

Mystery Manor mixes the gameplay mechanics of the best hidden object games, with immersive storytelling and beautiful graphics that could be on the walls of art galleries. Each room contains a unique story, which is intertwined with the rest of the narrative. As you progress, you can‚Äôt escape the feeling that there‚Äôs a darker hidden secret, possibly a crime ‚Äì one that involves all of the characters, and you the detective as well. After all, no one really knows how all the rooms and hidden objects came into existence in the first place ‚Äì could it be that you played a role in this too?

There‚Äôs only one way to solve this enigmatic mystery ‚Äì start your journey into the depths of the Manor that has more secrets than a big city, and don‚Äôt let a single detail escape your keen detective eyes.

Notable Mystery Manor game features:
‚úî Find hidden objects and complete various detective tasks
‚úî Join other seekers in search of amazing objects, keys, and clues
‚úî Use your detective skills to assemble beautiful collections
‚úî A captivating storyline that‚Äôll make you put down your favorite detective novel
‚úî Beautiful hand-drawn graphics
‚úî Tons of game modes to test your detective skills in finding hidden objects: words, silhouettes, phenomena, zodiac, and more
‚úî Regular free updates full of new characters, objects, and quests
‚úî Breathtaking mini-games and a Match-3 adventure
‚úî Hidden objects game that works offline without an Internet connection: Play it on the plane, on the subway, or on the road. Enjoy!

Official Page on Facebook:
https://www.fb.com/MysteryManorMobile/

Discover new titles from GameInsight:
http://www.game-insight.com
Join our community on Facebook:
http://www.fb.com/gameinsight
Subscribe to our YouTube channel:
http://goo.gl/qRFX2h
Read the latest news on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/GI_Mobile
Follow us on Instagram:
http://instagram.com/gameinsight/

Privacy policy: http://www.game-insight.com/site/privacypolicy"

comments: Like most of these HO games, things are frequently impossible to see, even zoomed in, on a phone. Other than that, great game. Enjoying it so far. Nothing innovative but visually beautiful and cute story. Edit; (Four stars down to two).Since the last update, buying extra seconds has more than doubled in price in an already VERY expensive game. More and more ads do not result in tools or time .

This is a great hidden object game ‚ù§Ô∏èI've been playing for ab 2 years now, it is a little difficult at times but that's kind of the point,right? Great game, definitely worth playing. Only problem I have is it takes to long to get the items necessary to enter rooms,for example: ammo for hunting room,yellow balloons for Japanese garden other than that no complaints,ty for a great game!

Good and fun game. The time limit is not enough for the rooms especially to twilight chamber room. Always want to buy extra 40secs from diamonds. Every single thing should be bought only via diamonds. No use of coins we earn. Match 3 are always the same. Again and again coming same levels. Irritating of playing the same again.

This is my third review for this game.... I had only gave 3 stars last time because I was upset over an incident that happened with a purchase I made. After I left my review I noticed I had a response on here and that they would try to fix the problem, but unfortunately I had a phone issue and had to restart my game on a new phone, so it didnt matter anyway. I hadnt had any issues prior to that and I havent had any issues since then plus I absolutely love this game, so 5 stars it is.

The game was pretty good for less than a week... The further you go the less free options are left. It's just became very frustrating and not really fun at all. Really hard to find objects and for every extra time and trophies you gotta pay or wait pretty looong. Well I had a good 1 week game. Ok üëå not anymore I guess.

title: ePlatform by Wheelers
description:
The ePlatform eBook and Audiobook app gives students and patrons of ePlatform enabled schools and public libraries, access to their digital collections, anywhere, anytime. 

Developed by Wheelers Books, its beauty lies in its intuitive simplicity. It‚Äôs quick, simple and free to install. Within minutes you‚Äôll be able to read your library eBooks or listen to Audiobooks anywhere, any time, on a multiple array of devices. You can even read and listen offline. Just log in once and begin reading; when you exit, your place is automatically book marked and saved so you can begin reading again with just one click. 

READY TO SEE WHAT‚ÄôS POSSIBLE?

1.	Using the app, find your School or Public Library.
2.	Login to authenticate yourself as a student of the school or library member (using your library card ID).
3.	Search, browse, look inside/ sample audio, borrow and reserve.

Titles return automatically after loan period (no late fees!) or choose to return them early. Helpfully, the App also synchronises reading location, highlights, notes and settings between devices. 

WHY YOU WILL LOVE EPLATFORM

ePlatform is designed to enable people of all ages to love books. It includes a raft of helpful features that students and patrons will appreciate like: 
-	Access to both School and Public Libraries you belong to.
-	Smart Settings Wizard with ability to customise - font type, font size, spacing between letters, words and lines, background colour, lock screen in portrait or landscape. enable night mode, adjust brightness.
-	Smart features to assist people with visual reading challenges like Dyslexia friendly settings.
-	Define or search words when reading.
-	Synchronise reading location, highlights, notes and settings between devices. 
-	Export highlighted text and notes from borrowed books in both text/ PDF formats.
-	Reading speed control and sleep timer are available when listening to an audiobook.
-	Sample any eBook or Audiobook, with no loan required.

Just log in once and begin reading; when you exit, your place is automatically book marked and saved so you can begin reading again with just one click.

READY TO SEE WHAT‚ÄôS POSSIBLE?

1. Using the app, find your School or Public Library.
2. Login to authenticate yourself as a student of the school or library member (using your library card ID).
3. Search, browse, look inside/ sample audio, borrow and reserve.

Titles return automatically after loan period (no late fees!) or choose to return them early. Helpfully, the App also synchronises reading location, highlights, notes and settings between devices.

WHY YOU WILL LOVE EPLATFORM

ePlatform is designed to enable people of all ages to love books. It includes a raft of helpful features that students and patrons will appreciate like:
- Access to both School and Public Libraries you belong to.
- Smart Settings Wizard with ability to customise - font type, font size, spacing between letters, words and lines, background colour, lock screen in portrait or landscape. enable night mode, adjust brightness.
- Smart features to assist people with visual reading challenges like Dyslexia friendly settings.
- Define or search words when reading.
- Synchronise reading location, highlights, notes and settings between devices.
- Export highlighted text and notes from borrowed books in both text/ PDF formats.
- Reading speed control and sleep timer are available when listening to an audiobook.
- Sample any eBook or Audiobook, with no loan required.
summary: eBook and Audiobook App to Access for ePlatform Enabled eLibraries
recentChanges:
Version 2.2.6
- Enable phone brightness adjustment when reading
- Stability and performance improvements
comments: Having problems updating font size and font type. It keeps reverting back to what it was. Also I can only pick my browsing menu when my tablet is on landscape. Little things but annoying üôÑ
everything was working fine until recently now the font keeps getting larger by itself and it won't let me change it to what i had it set at

It was working quite well for a few months at fist and I was really happy. However, today I noticed that I could not go to the next page and that every time I'd try, it would take me back to my loan menu.
Was very happy until the last week or so, when I open up my books are not showing, tells me my shelf is empty. I'm going to uninstall then reinstall hopefully this will work
I have trouble with the font size. It keeps reverting back to the default. Please see if you can fix this. Thanks.

title: LetraKid: Writing ABC for Kids Tracing Letters&123
description:
New game for preschool and primary school kids learning how to write.
LetraKid is an educational game for kids 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years old that can help them to learn to write block/print letters and pre cursive, while having fun when doing so!
Alphabet, ABCs letters, 0-9 numbers, shapes and various funny tracing exercises are included in practice worksheets.

****** 5/5 stars EducationalAppStore.com ******

WHAT KIDS WILL LEARN FROM THIS GAME

‚Ä¢ Recognize letter shapes and perfect alphabet pronunciation
‚Ä¢ The correct letter formation as learned in school: start, checkpoints, strokes direction, order etc. Difficulty Levels 1 and 2 with assisted writing are designed to focus on the letter formation.
‚Ä¢ Develop fine motor skills for handwriting activity. Difficulty Levels 3 to 5 with freehand writing activities will focus on this improvement to help maximize confidence and form when writing.
‚Ä¢ Playing with a stylus pen will also help to improve standard pencil grasp. Any stylus compatible with the device will work.

MAIN FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 16 languages with full support for interface, human native voices for letter/numbers pronunciation and full official alphabets.
‚Ä¢ 3 popular letter formation rules that will provide flexibility for picking the right stroke order and direction for the child. Vital for improving grasp on key terms and rulings within handwritting.
‚Ä¢ Makes use of the 10 most used fonts in classes all over the world for learning pre cursive and print block handwritting: ZB style, HWT style, DN style, German(Hamburg) style, NSW (AU), Victoria Modern (AU), KIWI(NZ), UK style, NORDIC and Euro Latino.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Left and Right handwriting rules. This is a writing app for lefties also.
‚Ä¢ 5 difficulty levels with AUTO and LOCK settings, ranging from assisted writing for beginners, up to real freehand writing with minimal support and strict evaluation.
‚Ä¢ 4 set of glyphs: ABC (full alphabet for upper case letters), abc (full alphabet for lower case letters), 123 (numbers from 0 to 9) and a special set of shapes for funny exercises.
‚Ä¢ 5 progression levels, color coded for each glyph that allows parents and teachers an instant evaluation of the progression and most exercised letters at the alphabet level.
‚Ä¢ 16 funny sticker rewards that will unlock after progression milestones are reached. Writing practice made fun.
‚Ä¢ 3 profile slots with 50 funny avatars and name customization that will save independently the settings and the progression.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Landscape and Portrait orientations.

GREAT IN THE CLASSROOM!

With a unique and real-time feedback feature as well as complex tracing evaluation algorithms, LetraKid - Learn to Write is one of a kind tracing app.

This is a new approach, focused on creating a fun game by utilizing handwritting mechanics itself. This avoids using distracting random rewards or secondary game mechanics that can break and confuse the learning process, optimizing learning progress and educational appeal to children.

The real time feedback will give both audio and graphic clues about the quality of the tracing and will adjust with difficulty level.
Our ABC and 123 tracing evaluation algorithms allow for an accurate and fun reward, using a 5 star rating for each exercise. This engages and motivates the kids to progress and to strive for more.

DESIGNED for KIDS

‚Ä¢ No irritating pop-ups.
‚Ä¢ No collection of personal data
‚Ä¢ Game settings are behind a parental gate. This can be enabled, and ensures a child to work with a certain font, formation rule, difficulty level and various other features for total specification to their needs.
‚Ä¢ This game can be useful for kids with autism, adhd, dyslexia or dysgraphia conditions.

A perfect educational game for kids to learn handwriting with ABCs and 123s either in kindergarten, pre-school, home-school, primary school or using as Montessori material.

recentChanges:
We have some great NEWS for our LetraKids!
1. English letter sounds are available now. Check the Settings page in English.
2. Ready for Cursive handwriting? Check out the new release LetraKid Cursive! Available on the Google Play store or with the new button link from the glyph selection pages.

Rate and Review! Thank you.

comments: Other apps only allow your child to make "perfect" letters. But this allows your child to progress from tracing to actually being able to see how their writing compares with the ideal. I found this app using my mobile but was unable to download it to my much older tablet. Is there an older version I may use for my 2015 device?

The best writing app Ive used. Great graphics, music. Includes mini games to break up the writing every so often. Has rewards. Kids live it. Even bigger kids had a play! Lots of settings/options eg choose font; left handed; difficulty; formation style; voice off.
Excellent app for preschool children to learn letters and numbers. My daughter is now a pro in letters and numbers by using this app. Just a suggestion, if you guyz can include words for beginners.

Good kids app but very confusing. This app keeps running security scans for I don't know what reason. I didn't even give any permission to do anything on my phone. And it re-installed itself once I un-installed it. Any explanation??

Stupid. Only a few letters are free and you have to pay for the rest UPDATE: I appreciate responses from developers, if they are polite and accepting of customer opinions. This is not. I'm not actually sure what the point of your response is? Reviews are not feedback for apps (though they can be used that way, sometimes) they are for others potential customers to see what others like and didn't like. I'm sorry my customer REVIEW was not useful for YOU, but you were not the intended audience. So really... #sorrynotsorry

title: EMERGENCY HQ - free rescue strategy game
description:
The new game in the EMERGENCY series - download the rescue simulator EMERGENCY HQ now!

EMERGENCY HQ is a rescue simulation game. Take control of emergency units, including fire and ambulance, police, SWAT and technical services. Head up operations of rescues, crimes, medical and catastrophe management, dispatch and command vehicles and personnel.
Control firefighters, EMTs, paramedics, doctors, police officers and special forces to fight fires, rescue animals, save lives, fight terrorists and much more. Build up your base and put together the perfect emergency services team! Upgrade your fire trucks, hospital, other buildings and units, expand your headquarters. Use the Fire Department, Rescue Service, Police Department, and Technical Units to master the many exciting and challenging missions!

Join forces in a rescue alliance and support friends in challenging missions. 

Do you have what it takes to be a hero? Fight The Chaos! Play the top firefighter game now!

EMERGENCY HQ - the fire fighter and rescue simulator game - is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

comments: I've played this game before, and I love it. But now that I've reinstalled it, it isn't loading. Every time it gets to, let's say, 93%, it crashes and takes me back to my phone's home screen. Then I have to restart the game only to see it crash again. I'm going to give it 4 stars once this bug is fixed, but until then it's going to be 2 stars. I love this game, but please fix all the bugs.

The main qualm i have with this game is how expensive all of the buildings are. I played this game for the longest time and stopped. Now I remember why. Buildings are way too expensive and im having to use gems to skip missions that I cant do becuase I dont have the right units. It's either a time consuming grind or spending real money.

Been playing for a few days and i am really enjoying this game, it seems to be more than fair so its not forcing me into making payments i dont want to make ect, there NO forced ads which is amazing too say. The gameplay is smooth and fun. The missions are repeated sometimes but hey, more money, xp and the 3rd time round its all 3x. Its nice to see a committed and fair developer. Thank You üëåüëçüíô

There is no new exciting things and the game is become boring for me. Earning of coins is low and vehicle call cost is high and upgrade charges are too high. Connecting issue even i am connected to a high speed wifi. Every day 3 to 4 missions i have to skip by using 5 emerald because my base is not enough to complete those missions then why it is showing to me. Earning of emerald is too low per day according to its experience. No new events.

I actually like this game but, from 4 star, I made it 2 star. Since you didnt do anything abt this "CONNECTION ERROR" problem sht. In this game, "BUILDINGS ARE EXPENSIVE". So everytime that connection problem appear, I lost the money i spent for the units. FIX IT THIS TIME. PLEASE... I think every player has the same problem. Atleast return the money back.

title: Cognify - Text and Content Player
description:
For efficient reading and learning. Listen to text, comment and answer questions by speech and more. Easy to use anytime anywhere.

Uses the most advanced text-to-speech and speech recognition technologies.

Cognify allows you to listen to documents ‚Äì lecture notes, worksheets ‚Äì any text based document really. Cognify can be used by students, teachers, educators, colleges, universities, schools. But not just listen to documents, you can pause the document and then dictate your own time-stamped comments. This is great if you want to review your course or lecture notes or your draft assignments maybe.

Cognify is also great for professionals who need to provide feedback on the work of others like draft letters, contracts, legal documents. Professionals can listen to a document, pause at any point and dictate their comments like - ‚Äòyou have forgotten to add this‚Äô, ‚Äòthis is not quite correct‚Äô. This means that you can work hands-free.

 

For teachers and lecturers, Cognify does a lot more ‚Äì

¬∑         Add open questions to a document so that Cognify ‚Äòasks the question‚Äô and then waits for students to dictate their answers.

¬∑         Add multiple-choice questions so that Cognify asks the question, then reads each of the possible options out, pauses and waits for the student to say their answer.

¬∑         Multiple-choice questions can be designed to either feedback on the correct answer or wait for it to be marked by the teacher or lecturer.

¬∑         When students have worked through a document, they can send it to the teacher for marking.

¬∑         Open existing web pages, to which new comments can be added, for example, teachers can direct students to open a specific web page, like a Wikipedia entry and add their own comments.

¬∑         Add captions to images, so that when Cognify reaches the image, it reads out caption. For example, explaining the meaning of a graph. When Cognify reaches an image it maximises it for display.

¬∑         Students can export just their answers from a Cognify file to send to their teacher or lecturer

 

The benefits of Cognify are that you can work or study ‚Äòhands free‚Äô without the need to see the screen or use a keyboard ‚Äì just listen to something and dictate your comments and answers.

 

Cognify is especially helpful for students with extra learning needs like dyslexia where they might struggle to understand a piece of text. Students can ‚Äòplay‚Äô the same piece of text as many times as they like, just by clicking in the place in the document they want to listen to again. Students can also change the speed at which Cognify reads documents.

 

Cognify has been partially funded by UfI Charitable Trust (ufi.co.uk) through its VocTech seed funding initiative and is a collaborative effort between WellSource and Pembrokeshire College.

¬∑ Add captions to images, so that when Cognify reaches the image, it reads out caption. For example, explaining the meaning of a graph. When Cognify reaches an image it maximises it for display.

¬∑ Students can export just their answers from a Cognify file to send to their teacher or lecturer



The benefits of Cognify are that you can work or study ‚Äòhands free‚Äô without the need to see the screen or use a keyboard ‚Äì just listen to something and dictate your comments and answers.



Cognify is especially helpful for students with extra learning needs like dyslexia where they might struggle to understand a piece of text. Students can ‚Äòplay‚Äô the same piece of text as many times as they like, just by clicking in the place in the document they want to listen to again. Students can also change the speed at which Cognify reads documents.



Cognify has been partially funded by UfI Charitable Trust (ufi.co.uk) through its VocTech seed funding initiative and is a collaborative effort between WellSource and Pembrokeshire College.
summary: For effective reading and learning. Listen to text, comment & interact by voice

comments: Been playing this game for a couple of months now and still enjoying it. Ads are very short and do not interrupt gameplay. You can also opt for the ad free version. I personally especially like the challenge levels and the opportunity to watch full ads in order to earn rotations which can be saved and help loads if there are no suitable spaces left. A great game. No complaints at all üèÜ

Love the game! However, to earn extra rotators you have to watch commercials. Sometimes many many commercials. The commercials are redundant. Based on your online searches, the commercials are geared to your interests. But if you enjoy watching American Girl 5 maybe 10 times in a row, this might be the game for you. They also offer different wood block games and show you those commercials over and over and over again. You would think if they would be a little creative.

Great gamec- I initially liked this game. At first you could get a free rotator every 5 minutes plus a 30 second ad. Now I have to wait for a free rotator every 24 hours. I DO NOT RECOMMEND this game to anyone. I am part of a group of people who download games, test them, and grade them and pass our comments to them who then pass the recommendations on to everybody in the group and then we pass them on to our friends and family. I do not recommend this game in any way whatsoever.

I Love Puzzles!!! Been playing this game for about a year or so and it's always fun and challenging. I enjoy a challenge with games like this! I will continue playing it. Happy to see the feature added of being able to rotate the piece to fit where you want it. Cool! Thanks!! Continue with enhancing the app to be even greater! üôÇ

Rubbish app, spent more time restarting app than playing it. The first few days it was fine but as I ran out of rotates I watched a couple of ad's, to get some more, the app never worked correctly after that. It just kept freezing up. Was fun to play but since there are several versions I might try another block game

‚≠êKEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED ‚Äì Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues

comments: I enjoy the game, the storyline and graphics. Like other have noted, not having stored items count towards your flowers seems odd. It's difficult to get compasses at times to open land - sometimes I have literally played about 1500 in points and got only one compass - particularly when having to play a completed scene over and over to just get enough stars to buy something. Which is another thing - I thought 36000 was a lot, then it was 38000, now 72000! Have to spend a lot of money to advance.

Love the many different aspects of the game...*the 'seek n find to gain points, increasing your coin level so you can *buy (houses, animals...), to increase your PRESTIGE, (the flowers you earn level up), *creating your own island! The *story line, following June from level to level! You don't have to make in app purchases; alternative ways to raise your coins to keep active until you meet your goals! You can also *follow JJ on Facebook!! My favorite game!!!

I like the varied parts to the game- mystery, puzzles, hidden items, building. The characters are realistic, not cartoon-like. I have had no glitches/bugs and the buttons to change scenes work easily. I was a bit confused about game play at the first scene but I went to the information and it became more clear. There are many layers to this game.

The game is fun but I have spent too much money to gain power ups, energy and gems go get farther in the game. The % you win for each seen you play to earn stars isn't equal to how well you play. It only gives you 10% increase when you "finish" a "scene" even if you get a perfect. If I get a perfect I should be earning more than 8-10% for playing great. Lots of improvements are needed.

I enjoy this game. The graphics are well done (I did find one typo but in this day and age that isn't bad) and the game play enjoyable. It is relaxing for me. I was also very impressed at the quick response to my inquiry about something that was actually me forgetting an aspect of game play about storing items. I had my answer in one day. I honestly wasn't that confident that something like a game maker would be that attentive to my dumb question. Good job!

comments: This is definitely the best browser I have ever used. I use this browser on my phone and my computer, and only this browser. Also, the new night mode is a really great feature, even for an experiment. Some things which I never knew had a dark mode are now dark, which makes things far better, especially since it is around the Halloween time and night mode sets the mood for it. Definite 5/5. I wish I could rate higher.

A smooth browser, and they give me reports of how many trackers and ads the block on a regular basis! I love the privacy, and I've actually noticed a difference in the ads I get from when I had internet explorer. My only complaints (small ones) are that there is only a back button and no forward button, and that it can be somewhat difficult to make new files in bookmarks. Other than that, it is a great browser!

It's the fastest browser I have ever used. But I have some problems- 1- Brave ask me to confirm my download only for the first time, after that it automatically starts downloading (it should ask everytime just like opera). 2- Tor should be included in the private session(as of now it's only available in pc mode). 3- A built in VPN should be included just like opera. If these problems are solved then I'll rate it 5 üåü. If anyone is reading this review, without a doubt you should give it a try!

It's very fast. I like the idea of Brave rewards which allows the user to "tip" contributors, though still in its infancy, if it takes off in the 2020's, will help everyone from developers to artists to earn an income. I like the browser's user privacy factor. It feels like a skin of Chrome so it is easy to get used too. Check the browser out, after all it's free to use!

For some reason if you're watching a YouTube video and you pause the video for any length of time, when you come back to it it automatically mutes the video. And you have about a three second window to unmute it. Also, Brave forces upon you a screensaver of the last thing you're looking at on brave. It's just very annoying. There's got to be a better app somewhere.

title: Neurodiversity App (ND-App)
description:
‚ÄòI feel I can do some things but can‚Äôt always show others what I can do. ‚ÄòI sometimes feel like the odd one out‚Äô. ‚ÄòI‚Äôm sure I could achieve more if I had the right help‚Äô. Sound familiar? Maybe you feel you have untapped talents, or some challenges in areas that others seem to find easy. 
Let Neurodiversity App (ND-App) help you.

About ND App
The ND App is your personalised guide to identifying and nurturing your skills, enabling you to thrive at home, work or in education. This App helps unlock your strengths and identifies challenges to your personal growth, offering advice and guidance that can help you be the best you can be, as well as gaining insights into any problem areas. Neurodiversity App is the first app worldwide that screens for neurodiversity and identifies strengths and challenges and provides practical suggestions to help you to be the best you can.
 
What does this strength and challenge screening app do?
The ND App is a screener that processes your information to produce a personalised skill-set report. ND App uses state of the art research and latest technology to ‚Äéhelp identify your strengths and challenges in these areas - Cognitive skills, Emotion, Feelings, Organising, Time Management, Speaking, Listening, Literacy, Numeracy and Motor Skills. The highly informative report can provide a discussion point with those who support you, including family, managers and educational support. Revolutionary technology developed by internationally recognised cognitive and learning specialists creates your report identifying key areas that may require attention.

Who can ND App help?
The app, questions and reports are designed for anyone over 16 years of age who wants to understand themselves better and thinks they maybe neurodiverse or already been diagnosed having one or more conditions but wants a better understanding of themselves overall.

Is ND App accessible?
Yes. ND App is at the forefront of accessible technology enabling questions and reports to be read out aloud. You can also change colours and fonts. It has not been specifically designed for those with visual and hearing impairment as the responses may alter because of specific challenges. This may need to be considered when completing the tool if you do have a visual or hearing impairment.

How can ND App help me?
It can help you to start to understand your strengths and challenges, be they are home, work or in education. The report can be emailed to you, identifies key areas that may require some attention and provides practical tips to help. Although designed as a screener, it may provide a starting point for discussions such as managers, in education or your family. It may help you to consider if having a full diagnostic assessment would be worthwhile. 

Is there lots of reading to do?
The questions and the onscreen report can be read out to you using your phone text-to-speech.

What areas does it look at?
You may have come across terms such as neurodiversity, a positive term that describes people who have a varying cognitive profile. Conditions under this umbrella term include: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Autism Spectrum Conditions (ASC), Dyscalculia, Dyslexia, Developmental Language Disorders and Developmental Co-ordination Disorder (also known as Dyspraxia). There is a lot of terminology out there, and the focus is to identify specific areas of challenge as well as looking at what you are good at. However, from work we have done in the past ten years the report indicates traits in the areas of:
Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
Autism Spectrum Conditions (ASC)
Dyscalculia
Dyslexia
Developmental Language Disorders
Developmental Co-ordination Disorder (also known as Dyspraxia or DCD)

*Note:  This should not be seen as a diagnostic tool.
descriptionHTML:
‚ÄòI feel I can do some things but can‚Äôt always show others what I can do. ‚ÄòI sometimes feel like the odd one out‚Äô. ‚ÄòI‚Äôm sure I could achieve more if I had the right help‚Äô. Sound familiar? Maybe you feel you have untapped talents, or some challenges in areas that others seem to find easy.
Let Neurodiversity App (ND-App) help you.

About ND App
The ND App is your personalised guide to identifying and nurturing your skills, enabling you to thrive at home, work or in education. This App helps unlock your strengths and identifies challenges to your personal growth, offering advice and guidance that can help you be the best you can be, as well as gaining insights into any problem areas. recentChanges: Based on User feedback, we have resolved several bugs for certain hardware/software combinations, improved the predictive algorithms and improved the feedback and suggestions for users.
comments: Provides an overview of personal strengths as well areas of difficulty. Report is clear and has diagrams making it easier to understand. Report could be useful reference when individuals want to have discussions with HR or line managers related to in-depth screening and workplace needs assessment etc.

The app works well and was quite simple to use, however one improvement would be to include more languages. Instructions should be added before the test begins. I found the app interesting to see my mental aptitude. Great job and keep working on the app to improve it.
Useful app but.... There's a few questions about hearing. I have severe hearing loss so I score low on them which alter the results of the test
Quick, easy to get through. Report was instant and simple to understand. The app loaded seamlessly on my Samsung A9.
Great app, but could do with better instruction.

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.
* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.
* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills! 

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy

comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: SoloLearn: Learn to Code for Free
description:
SoloLearn has the largest collection of FREE code learning content, from beginner to pro! Choose from thousands of programming topics to learn coding concepts, brush up your programming knowledge, or stay aligned with the latest coding trends.

You will be greeted by the friendliest community of coders, where peer support is an essential part of learning and development.  Fresh learning content is created by the community daily, facilitating efficient and effective coder skill improvement.  

Join millions of other coders for anytime anywhere access to countless coding topics and assignments. Write and run real code in our mobile code editor, get inspired through real-life code samples, and engage in interactive community conversations along the way. 

 ‚Ä¢ Google Play's Editor's Choice 

 ‚Ä¢ "SoloLearn has done a beautiful job creating a mobile learning experience that combines personal accomplishment with a community engagement." - Facebook's FbStart App of the Year Judge

 ‚Ä¢ "[Aimed] at "millennials" and students who want a simpler way to learn." - TechCrunch

 ‚Ä¢ "There are hundreds of different quizzes and activities in the code playground section to keep practicing." - Forbes

 ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúSoloLearn aims to make it easier by breaking down programming concepts into quick, digestible daily lessons." - Lifehacker


FRESH, FREE CONTENT DAILY:
‚Ä¢ Web Development, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery
‚Ä¢ Python
‚Ä¢ Java
‚Ä¢ Kotlin
‚Ä¢ C++

‚Ä¢ Ruby

‚Ä¢ And many other topics you will not find anywhere else.

PERSONALIZED. Content is delivered based on your progress, preference, and hottest market trends. 

FREE 24/7 PEER SUPPORT. Ongoing community support and real-time alerts make learning to code as easy and enjoyable as it can possibly get.

FREE KNOWLEDGE SHARING. Create lessons in your area of expertise and become a community influencer that millions will look up to. Improve your profile and invest in your future using what you already know. 

FREE MOBILE CODE EDITOR. Write, run, and share real code right from your mobile, without any additional installations and setups.

comments: I am very new to conding. I love the step by step, move at your own pace format. My only gripe so far. Is that, the only time you pactice coding is when you fill in the blanks. I think it would be better, if the lessons allowed you to copy the code and type it as program are constructed. instead of allowing you to run the code that has already been typed for you. I think I would remember better. If I had done it myself.

SoloLearn is a great study tool for me because it explains concepts in a way that is easy for me to follow and helps me prepare for exams. I also enjoy using it as a tool to help me get ahead in my classes and ensure that I understand the different constraints of programming languages, as well as how they can be used.

This app is Excellent in the ways which it provides a great spectrum on all the programming languages and a coding playground whereby sololearn users can practice codes and execute source codes to get results. Go ahead and Try it for yourself, whether you have a knowledge in programming skills or a beginner in programmimg. I didnt know coding when i started and now I have basic knowledge on all the programming languages that are required for starting your own program.

I'm learning Python 3 really fast! If you honestly want to learn how to code, and you like the idea of tests and interactive lessons, this is definitely the app for you. Sometimes, you can slip off, I get that feeling as it has happened to me before, but if you invest enough time while you're interested, you might just learn enough before the shut down!

Many languages to choose from, but only one lesson for free and you market as a free to learn app is kind of misleading. Also if you're wondering why not a lot of people are learning code is because apps like this one become to expensive to use. It's not a free to use app unless all lessons are free. Other than that I don't know what you're learning because you can't do anything with just variables. Not a lot of people want to learn code because they have to pay.

title: Letter Puzzle: Learn To Read
description:
Includes: English, German, French, Spanish, Hindi, Chinese, Russian, Indonesian, Italian, Turkish, Polish, Danish, Swedish, Bulgarian, Catalan, Georgian, Slovak, Czech, Hungarian, Greek, Romanian

Can learning to read be as easy and exciting as playing a computer game? We've developed a game with which you can learn to read intuitively and individually, as you would play a game.
We believe that a learning game has to be so good that it would encourage you to play it even though you might not be interested in its pedagogical content. We've done our best to implement this idea in our game. In doing so, we incorporate psycho-pedagogical foundations and concepts from the Montessori method, improve upon such tools as phonetic charts and present the syllables as they are actually spoken and not as they would be if spoken separately. Our emphasis is not on learning to recite the alphabet or spelling out words; on the contrary, instead of learning the ABC off by heart, the pupil learns which sounds actually occur in each word. As such, double vowels, for instance, are never separated.

Should you have any further questions about our pedagogical method or about the game itself, please feel free to contact us at: info@regentropfen.org 

The game is adapted for children aged 4 to 8, regardless of whether the pupil goes to school, kindergarten, pre-school or primary school. Children in higher grade may also profit from the game in case of various reading and/or spelling difficulties such as dyslexia. You can also use the game to learn some basics of foreign languages, regardless of your age: thanks to the audio clips, you can discover learn the pronunciation of the individual phonemes in each word. You hence not only learn a translation of the word, but have a native speaker show you the meaning and the spelling of each word. Of course, this is not meant to be a complete linguistic pedagogical environment: the words offered are all nouns and there are as of yet no adjectives, verbs and no punctuation. Learning the language is based here on a challenging speaking vocabulary trainer. This app however can be used as an interactive introduction to the acquisition of speaking skills for individual words. The game does not contain a dictionary and is not split up in individual lessons, but rather in levels with various themes such as pirates, animals or vehicles.
