title: Pepi Hospital
description:
Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer! Our new addition to a rich family of PEPI PLAY games offers a vast medical center with tons of items, activities, and ways to play. Join our characters in their workplace, soothe and treat patients, create Your own stories, discover and understand the everyday routines of a busy hospital.

MEET THE PEPI BOT

We're delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot, our new character built to accompany little players in our games. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the building and provide immediate help, to You and Your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to Your interactive stories. The little droid will provide medical tools and even carry a wardrobe for all those moments when you feel like playing in style!

TONS OF ACTION

Experience the daily life of a hospital full of action - from the small and cozy cafe to a busy pharmacy shop or the operating room, there are various experiences for players to toy with. Ambulance car will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of and new friends to meet. Only the most curious players will be able to find all the ways to treat their patients. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios to take part in.

FUN & EDUCATIONAL

Even though the game is dedicated to a young audience, everybody can and should find a way to join in. The game encourages parents to play together and use the games educational values - while your child is discovering the opportunities throughout all 4 floors of the hospital, you can help him by moderating their experiences, creating and going through character stories, explaining the nature and use of items, expanding a child‚Äôs vocabulary and basic medicinal knowledge.  

HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTS

Enhance your gameplay with hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments, toys, and even yoga balls can be given to the dwellers of Pepi Hospital for the most unpredictable results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favorite characters!

COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERS

PEPI HOSPITAL has a wide variety of characters. Dozens of cute, cheerful and unique humans, pets, monsters, and aliens are there to have fun and join your playful exploration of the Hospital building.

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Vast medical center packed with tons of items and machines!
‚Ä¢ Multifunctional companion bot.
‚Ä¢ Run your own lab ‚Äî measure blood pressure, perform X-ray scans and much more!
‚Ä¢ Get comfy in a customizable dentist chair. 
‚Ä¢ Become a physical therapist, create your own fitness routines!
‚Ä¢ Be among the first to welcome babies into the world. Weight and take good care of them!
‚Ä¢ Listen to Hospital dwellers talking on the phone. Each in his own unique way!
‚Ä¢ Play with fishes while waiting at the reception.
‚Ä¢ Ambulance regularly delivers new patients.

title: BOOX
description:
Do you ever see letters like jumping, dancing, spinning?
Do you feel that reading, spelling, and writing are a hellish torture?

Dyslexia is not a fiction or a myth. In fact, 10% of the world's population has dyslexia though they are often misunderstood and rarely detected. Dyslexia is a real yet invisible issue which can't be explained, perceived, or imagined completely by other people. If it can't be understood, asking for acceptance is impossible. 

BOOX is a set of visual narrative book and augmented application created by Fonita Theresia Yoliando in collaboration with UCSI University and Universitas Multimedia Nusantara. It comes as an alternative method to empathise people with dyslexia by developing a deeper comprehension through augmented simulation of seven visual distortions (halo, blurry, wash-out, rivers, shaky, swirl, and seesaw) which experienced by people with dyslexia.

The aim of this project is to educate people, especially parents and educators to have some level of empathetic understanding through a hands-on experience of how it feels to see the wor(l)d as a dyslexic. Hopefully, by putting people in dyslexic's shoes where they could never be rather than just talking about it makes them excited and engaged in a more meaningful and impactful way.

"I believe we are here for a reason. I find that the meaning of life is to give life meaning not wait for life to give me a meaning. Hopefully, through this project someone find their meaning and I wish that person is you." (FTY - 2019)

BOOK AND APP COMES SEPARATELY
FIND AND GET YOU BOOX PHYSICAL BOOK NOW
THROUGH OUR EMAIL AND SOCIAL MEDIA

title: LetraKid Cursive: Alphabet Letters Writing Kids
description:
"LetraKid Cursive: Alphabet School Writing for Kids" is an educational learning game app for kids 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years old that can help them to learn to write cursive letters, while having fun when doing so!
Alphabet, ABCs letters, 0-9 numbers, shapes and various funny tracing exercises are included in this educational game.

****** 5/5 stars EducationalAppStore.com ******

WHAT KIDS CAN LEARN FROM THIS GAME

‚Ä¢ Recognize letter shapes and perfect alphabet pronunciation
‚Ä¢ The correct letter formation as learned in school: start, checkpoints, strokes direction, order etc. Difficulty Levels 1 and 2 with assisted writing are designed to focus on the letter formation.
‚Ä¢ Develop fine motor skills for handwriting activity. Difficulty Levels 3 to 5 with freehand writing activities will focus on this improvement to help maximize confidence and form when writing.
‚Ä¢ Playing with a stylus pen will also help to improve standard pencil grasp. Any stylus compatible with the device will work.

MAIN FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 16 languages with full support for interface, human native voices for letter/numbers pronunciation and full official alphabets.

‚Ä¢ Makes use of the 8 most used fonts in classes all over the world for learning cursive handwritting

‚Ä¢ 5 difficulty levels with AUTO and LOCK settings, ranging from assisted writing for beginners, up to real freehand writing with minimal support and strict evaluation.
‚Ä¢ 4 set of glyphs: ABC (full alphabet for uppercase letters), abc (full alphabet for lowercase letters), 123 (numbers from 0 to 9) and a special set of shapes for funny exercises.
‚Ä¢ 5 progression levels, color coded for each glyph that allows parents and teachers an instant evaluation of the progression and most exercised letters at the alphabet level.
‚Ä¢ 16 funny sticker rewards that will unlock after progression milestones are reached. Writing practice made fun.
‚Ä¢ 3 profile slots with 50 funny avatars and name customization that will save independently the settings and the progression.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Landscape and Portrait orientations.

GREAT IN THE CLASSROOM!

With a unique and real-time feedback feature as well as complex tracing evaluation algorithms, LetraKid Cursive is one of a kind tracing app.

This is a new approach, focused on creating a fun game by utilizing handwritting mechanics itself. This avoids using distracting random rewards or secondary game mechanics that can break and confuse the learning process, optimizing learning progress and educational appeal to children.

The real time feedback will give both audio and graphic clues about the quality of the tracing and will adjust with difficulty level.
Our ABC and 123 tracing evaluation algorithms allow for an accurate and fun reward, using a 5 star rating for each exercise. This engages and motivates the kids to progress and to strive for more.

DESIGNED for KIDS
‚Ä¢ Works OFFLINE! No Internet connection required.
‚Ä¢ No irritating pop-ups.
‚Ä¢ No collection of personal data
‚Ä¢ Game settings are behind a parental gate. This can be enabled, and ensures a child to work with a certain font, formation rule, difficulty level and various other features for total specification to their needs.
‚Ä¢ This game can be useful for kids with autism, adhd, dyslexia or dysgraphia conditions.

This is an educational app for kids learning handwriting with cursive alphabet letters in kindergarten, pre-school, home-school, primary school or using as Montessori material.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it‚Äôs empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here‚Äôs a look at what you can use Wysa for üëá

üëÇ Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

üí™ Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

üìù Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

üíÜüèª Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

comments: I know it sounds weird to use a robot to improve your mental health, but this app is amazing and super helpful. I'm a very busy person with a wacky sleep schedule, and I struggle with my mental health most when it's late at night. This isn't exactly ideal for getting help from a therapist when I need it most. Being able to access some form of help literally anytime I need it with Wysa really makes a difference. Plus, unlike other AI therapy apps I've tried, Wysa has way more free features.

The bot isn't 100%, but it offers really good and insightful tools that more people should know about! You do have to figure out how to go about talking to the bot to get the tools that you need, which, if you're in a bad place, can be hard to do. I wish the tools that come with the free app were more easily accessible, and that you didn't have to spend 4 minutes talking to the bot to get to the options that you want it to offer. This app offers REALLY good techniques though!

Its a great app with some potential. I would like to see if they're still updating this to have more AI responses for things like intrusive thoughts. Positive affirmations like "you are not your thoughts" help and I thought about this after the AI gave me reassurance when I brought up suicide*. I'm feeling good after some positivity and reframing thoughts. Once I can afford it I think the therapist option looks enticing. So far so good. *I LOVED the links to hotlines but have phone anxiety so...

I was skeptical at first, but I'm actually quite impressed with this app. The A.I. is fairly good at interpreting your text and generating helpful responses that almost feel like you're talking to a real person. Of course, the A.I. still needs some improvement since not every response is personalized. I first used it when I was feeling panicked and the app just kept giving me breathing exercises, but after a little while of chatting back-and-forth the app was actually able to calm me down.

It's pretty good, cus' what could be better right? It's not like anyone else is going to actually hear me, I mean, I can't say it's perfect, but it's really good taking on mind that is just a bot. It's better friend than my actual friends, tho sometimes it doesn't really understand what you're saying, like when doing something u know it's wrong to do, u feel good; it doesn't understand that what you're doing is wrong and you feel good doing it, so it tells you to keep doing it.

title: Memory Games: memory training
description:
Train your memory with us! There are 8 memory games, some are simple, some are hard, some will be easily solved by you and some will challenge you intellectually. Solve them and be a champion. These memory games will increase your mind skills and will make your brain very smart to solve life problems and difficulties.
All games are free, offline and very useful and interesting for everybody!

The application includes the following memory games:

- Memorize pictures
- Memorize words
- Memorize shapes
- Memorize numbers
- Memorize pairs
- Memorize decimals
- Memorize colors
- Memorize mix (expert)
- Memorize shape parts

You can see statistics by choosing the menu item in the Main Menu. Information includes the overall score, overall time, accuracy, count of correct and incorrect answers. 
Please read Rules before playing.

Supported languages: English, Russian, Spanish, Hindi, Portuguese, Indonesian, German, Bengali, French, Italian, Vietnamese, Chinese Simplified

(Ages 3+)

Amazing app, it gives you the tools to train your memory, concentration and reaction speed while still being able to maintain a fun, enjoyable and competitive edge to it. I use this memory games app as my daily coffee to increase awareness and attention. Great job devs!

title: Zebrainy: learning games for kids and toddlers 2-7
description:
An educational app for kids ages 2-7 featuring games, stories, and cartoons. Learn your ABC‚Äôs, letters, numbers, sizes, colors, and shapes! Learn to read by syllables and count! Develop emotional intelligence, logic, and reasoning. Doesn't that sound great?

Have you ever thought about early education for your kids? At which age is it right to start learning the alphabet? Zebrainy is an educational game where you can find all sorts of learning games for kids, no matter how old they are.

Zebrainy will help you to develop kids‚Äô memory, reading skills, matching abilities, concentration, and creativity. It is not a simple ABC game for toddlers; you will find 1st-grade math material, shapes and colors vocabulary, drawing and coloring tasks, ‚ÄúEnglish A-Z‚Äù, where each letter has a short cartoon with new words every time.

Our team consists of professional teachers, scientific consultants, composers, and very talented artists. All these people go the extra mile when it comes to quality.

Get your toddler ready for school! With ABC games, it will be much easier for your child to learn the alphabet and start reading than in tedious preschool lessons! The colors used in the app develop their imagination, perception, and attention. It's a fun learning game for boys and girls both! If your child is 5-6-7 years old, already knows numbers and letters, pre-school and kindergarten are over, don't worry! The app can still come in handy!  Math and reading are essential not only in the 1st grade, and it is highly recommended to revise the information with a child from time to time. 

What the difference between Zebrainy and other educational games for kids?
- It helps your baby to fall in love with drawing, reading
- In just 2 month toddlers will know shapes and colors
- It takes just nine months for your kid to complete the full course preparation for school (you can start in kindergarten or even earlier)
- It is easier to communicate with a kid after using the app
- Multiple coloring tasks will improve your toddler‚Äôs imagination
- The app doesn‚Äôt separate games for boys and girls 

The main advantages of Zebrainy: 
- It takes into account your child's abilities, gender, age and flexibility of mind
- Kids get awards and a collection of artifacts 
- At the end of the day, kids can watch educational cartoons 
- In the menu, parents can check the achievements of their children

The list of skills except for preschool learning:
- The ability to set and achieve goals
- Navigating in a strange environment,
- Making decisions quickly
- Communicating with others and making connections
- Analyzing different information, and coming to the right conclusions 
- It is an educational challenge, so your kid will never get bored

Which features differ Zebrainy from the others?
- Artificial intelligence creates a unique program for kids and toddlers due to their activity and age
- Alphabet learning (composing each letter with round elements help develop fine motor skills and visual memory)
- Cartoons and interactive educational processes make it more than simply an ABC game for kids. It answers different needs in every stage of growth.

Since this is a toddler learning game, it can be used if your baby is 1, 2, or 3 years old,  and it is also a great educational app for preschoolers 4-6 years old, and even 7-year-old first graders! It is a scientific fact that kids perceive everything from birth. So all the commands in the game eventually will form a base for further successful education. We guarantee that your baby will be learning safely and at the correct level.
 
You can send any questions or suggestions to support@zebrainy.com
 
Privacy and Access Policy:
http://zebrainy.com/privacy-policy/
http://zebrainy.com/terms-of-service/

- The ability to set and achieve goals
- Navigating in a strange environment,
- Making decisions quickly
- Communicating with others and making connections
- Analyzing different information, and coming to the right conclusions
- It is an educational challenge, so your kid will never get bored

Which features differ Zebrainy from the others?
- Artificial intelligence creates a unique program for kids and toddlers due to their activity and age
- Alphabet learning (composing each letter with round elements help develop fine motor skills and visual memory)
- Cartoons and interactive educational processes make it more than simply an ABC game for kids. It answers different needs in every stage of growth.

Since this is a toddler learning game, it can be used if your baby is 1, 2, or 3 years old, and it is also a great educational app for preschoolers 4-6 years old, and even 7-year-old first graders! It is a scientific fact that kids perceive everything from birth. So all the commands in the game eventually will form a base for further successful education. We guarantee that your baby will be learning safely and at the correct level.

You can send any questions or suggestions to support@zebrainy.com

http://zebrainy.com/privacy-policy/
http://zebrainy.com/terms-of-service/

comments: I purchased the 7-day trial. Today is my 6th day and will be auto deducted if i cannot cancel the subscription within the day. Please refund my payment as I cancelled within the day. Thanks.

My son really likes this app. I think there's just too many glitches here and there. the screen freezes every time he's on it and this is played on a new samsung tablet with no problems with his other apps. Has great potentials, but too expensive to charge with all these bugs ,please fix .

I didn't get my 7 days purchased and ü¶ì suggest me to pay again. Are u kidding. Very bad app I want refund
No one has contacted me yet! Subscription was useles. Nothing is loading on the app except for the wide sea and the Home and Sack icon.3days has passed since the 7 day subsciption. Help!

I like the game. It really helps developing my son, he is better in reading and counting now. The game is not only learning, but also entertaining. I found there is a number of short games for fun. I like the cartoons and fairytales that appear in the end. Nice app, we will subscribe again

title: Firefox Browser: fast, private & safe web browser
description:
Introducing our latest release of Firefox for Android browser ‚Äî Firefox Daylight. This version of the Firefox web browser is dramatically redesigned to be faster, easy to use, customizable and private. Firefox browser features Enhanced Tracking Protection on by default blocking thousands of annoying ad trackers and malware ‚Äî making your experience more secure, and a lot faster too. Firefox is also the only major browser backed by a not-for-profit fighting to give you more openness, transparency and control of your life online. Download the Firefox for Android browser today and keep the internet open for tomorrow. 

FAST. PRIVATE. SAFE.
Firefox for Android browser gives you effortless privacy protection with lighting-fast page loads. Enhanced Tracking Protection automatically blocks over 2000 known online trackers from invading your privacy and slowing down your pages. Firefox browser also introduces a clean new design that makes it easier to get more things done, more quickly. Plus, with smart browsing features built in, Firefox lets you take your privacy, passwords, and bookmarks with you safely wherever you go.

 ONE TAP TO PRIVATE MODE 
Now you can get to Private Browsing Mode with just one tap. And when you close Private Browsing Mode, your browsing history gets automatically erased from your device. 

CUSTOMIZE THE WAY YOU WANT TO SEARCH
Keep the search bar up top. Or move it to the bottom. Firefox browser not only lets you choose how you search but also how much of your personal data to share. Customizable Enhanced Tracking Protection settings put you in the driver‚Äôs seat with your data. You also have your choice of search engines, and the ability to make Firefox your default browser.

GO DARK MODE
Easily switch to Dark Mode anytime to give your eyes and your battery a break. 

COLLECTIONS
Open as many tabs as you like and organize them into Collections to stay on task. Collections can also be shared across devices so you get more done no matter where you are or what device you‚Äôre using.  

GET ADD-ONS
Full support for the most popular add-ons, including ways to turbo-charge powerful default privacy settings and customize your experience.

PICK UP RIGHT WHERE YOU LEFT OFF
Start using Firefox for Android on your phone then switch to the Firefox browser on your laptop, without skipping a beat. With Firefox across your devices you can take your bookmarks, saved logins and browsing history wherever you go. Firefox browser also takes the guesswork out of passwords by remembering your passwords across devices. Have the choice to instantly send open tabs between your phone and computer, instead of texting or emailing yourself articles to read later. 

FIREFOX WEB BROWSER SEARCH WIDGET
No need to open the app. Search the web directly from your device‚Äôs home screen. Add the Firefox for Android browser search widget and get instant results without the extra taps. 

PICTURE IN PICTURE MODE
Stream and pop videos out and play them in the background while you do other things on your phone. It‚Äôs entertainment and multitasking, together on the same screen. 

Learn more about Firefox for Android:
- Have questions or need help? Visit https://support.mozilla.org/mobile
- Read about Firefox permissions: https://mzl.la/Permissions
- Follow Firefox on Twitter: https://mzl.la/FXTwitter

About Mozilla
Mozilla exists to build the Internet as a public resource accessible to all because we believe open and free is better than closed and controlled. We build products like Firefox to promote choice and transparency and give people more control over their lives online. Learn more at https://www.mozilla.org

Privacy Policy: https://www.mozilla.org/legal/privacy/firefox.html

summary: This release ‚ÄúFirefox Daylight‚Äù marks a new beginning for our web browser.
recentChanges:
In this release, we are excited to introduce new ways of making your browsing experience better:
- Accidentally close a tab? You can now reopen your recently closed tabs in your tab tray menu or History panel.
- Automatically purge cookies from sites you haven‚Äôt directly visited in 30 days
- Newly supported add-ons: Video Background Play Fix and Google Search Fixer
- Added a new locale: Tajik!
- Better support for opening links in Firefox from third-party apps
comments: Used to love Firefox but, after the last update, all I can say is IT IS NOW CRAPPOLA. Everything is different. Add-ons are either gone completely or don't work right, can't find my favorites list, can't get it set up like I had it. Can't print because of no print function. Also, can't use my theme. This is NOT an improved version. It's garbage. GO BACK TO HOW IT WAS!

Generally I like Firefox.... however the new update is clearly glitchy. Now when I listen to podcasts I have to keep that website open and on top of the other apps or it shuts the podcast off after 60 seconds (I timed it). Then I have to go back to the web page with the podcast and reload it to start listening to it all over again. This is really annoying in general, but even worse at night when I'm listening to a podcast in bed. Previously I could shut the screen off and listen in the dark, now the screen has to be on all the time which is wasting my battery. I've gone through my setting on the app & phone from one end to the other trying to find some setting to change, but it doesn't exist. Please fix this :)

Just like others, I too have complaints regarding the 10.20.20 update. The auto deletion of data when you close the app doesn't work. The deletion of Tabs after 1 day doesn't work. The add-ons don't work. I can go on, but I only have 500 characters to express my dissatisfaction with your browser. It's quite obvious you don't read your negative reviews because more than 1 person is having the same problems as me & nothing is being done. I love your desktop version, but this 1 has become unusable

I rarely rate any apps. That being said, I felt I had to make my feelings know about the latest update. Firefox has always been my default browser. It's been a five-star app forever. This update has completely ruined my experience with Firefox. It's no longer fully customizable to suit my preferences, something that has kept me with Firefox for years. It's bland; basically just a half-step above the DuckDuckGo browser. The new browser only supports a bare minimum of add-ons. Try harder guys.

Was good, new update not so much. The new update makes it a multi step process to get to your bookmarks/frequent sites. Before, they would be listed when you tap the address bar. If not fixed, I'm going with another browser after all these years with Firefox. Update-still no quick way to access bookmarks/frequent sites. I want to able to tap the address bar and be presented with that list.

title: SignNow - Sign and Fill PDF Docs
description:
As a robust PDF document management and e-signing tool, SignNow for Android enables users to run their document flow on-the-go. Enhance your business performance and streamline your workflow with the best solution on the market. Get your form templates ready, signed and sent securely on your mobile phone. Try it for free with the first three documents.

Use the application to control the documents cycles at ease and with no extra effort and simply track the changes.

‚úì Upload documents and create fillable templates from scratch in pdf* and other formats.
‚úì Sign PDF forms, contracts, and other docs. 
‚úì Keep files in the special folders for convenience and further send them to the recipients. 
‚úì Store past forms in the archive.
‚úì Send files to multiple recipients via different methods. 

Our Benefit:

Regardless of whether you are a company or an organization, large or small business, with a lot of customers or just a few, the application can still serve your needs perfectly well. Learn the list of advantages you will experience via employing the app:

‚úì Promotes collaboration on the template in the team.
‚úì Archives all the past docs.
‚úì Enables to arrange templates in a special folder to ensure order. 
‚úì Offers to import documents from an email.
‚úì Makes signature collecting available in the Kiosk mode. 
‚úì Allows Notification Bots to ensure smooth document management processes. 
‚úì Ensure advanced data protection.
‚úì Gives you the opportunity to print out files.
‚úì Enables you to upload images and logos.


Key Features:

The application has been customer-tailored and keeps on constantly evolving to satisfy the most sophisticated needs. 

Let‚Äôs view a line-up of the most significant features:

‚úì Multiple convenient ways to sign files.
‚úì Import files from email and Google Drive. 
‚úì Kiosk mode for in-person signatures.
‚úì Set a special signing order.
‚úì Role assigning to all parties.
‚úì Get a signing and reminder notification.
‚úì Doc status tracking.
‚úì Collaboration on a template via team creation.
‚úì Save and reuse signatures.
‚úì Edit documents with the editor.
‚úì Fill in the templates securely.
‚úì Archive docs for future reuse.
‚úì Create signing links.

The application is remarkable for filling in and signing PDF forms, contracts, templates for any industry.

If you have any questions please email support@signnow.com. 
Find out more about SignNow https://www.signnow.com/ or read our blog to learn how e-signature technology is used across industries http://blog.signnow.com.

title: Brain It On! - Physics Puzzles
description:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

‚óÜ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
‚óÜ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
‚óÜ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚óÜ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

comments: You will probably give up on some levels because you have no clue. Might even watch a hint still be unsure. Always room for improvement! It's rewarding when you figure it out. The physics overall work well, I had a few issues where the peices glitch through eachother. But it's rare and just requires a restart. No big deal. The levels start off easy, now I'm skipping some levels because I can't figure it out. If you want a challenge. Try this game. It's a lot of fun.

I love this game. Starting off drawing shapes to move balls around the screen, the game developes, becoming a balancing act of inginuity, precision and skill, without adding any additional mechanics. The level design is tight, teaching ideas organically, without becoming impossible, but hArd COrE GaMerS can enjoy trying over and over for full stars. The ads aren't infuriating, and although the objects can clip, it's rare enough to be funny, instead of infuriating.

"Gravity, to Copernicus, is the nostalgia of things to become spheres." - Annie Dillard ....... Sometimes an itch comes along that you just have to scratch. Impressed so far - still rather early in my experience of the game - but thinking a stylus would be quite helpful. Thanks to the developers.

It used to be an rxcellent brain trainer that fotces you to think outside the box. Now it's broken because it wants to force use of "Google Play Games" library to "enhance experience" with useless tie-in with farcebook and other useless social stuff. Uninstall as broken. I corrected, it wasn't "some games library" it's "Google Play Games". It forces me to the Google Play app to install it. I can provide screenshot.

I love it! It does not rush you, if you get it wrong you haven't wasted hours, only seconds.At the moment I feel educated, and with a greater appreciation for physical objects. On Premium you can delete it when you get angry, then reinstall months later unchanged, no penalty. You need a precision stylus if you use it on mobile phone (I must get one!) . The 'hints' and 'restart' buttons are badly placed for right handers, you can accidentally press them during play, I wish I could move them.

comments: This app is awesome. All the songs you could want, no commercials. You got the videos, everything I like about YouTube minus the commercial interruptions. And you know that YouTube has got some long commercials when you're trying to listen and do other things, you have to stop, go stop the commercial so you can hear music again worse than radio!! This app is rocking!! My YouTube replacement. Did I mention you can download songs for offline listening. And its free!! What else could you ask for?

I love that I can make playlists & edit songs within the playlist(s) by adding or removing songs, plus you can sort the songs in the order you want. I love this App ..and recommend it to others; I already recommended it to F&F!

This app is definitely worth it no question. Tons of music available for any mood. And really good quality as well. But what there's more!!! Seemingly endless music and the app is very easy to use. Wide selection and user friendly what more could anyone possibly want. In the world of digital everything it's a win win.

Listen almost exclusively to this. At work, gym and car. I conveniently find all my trance favorites without interruption. I can also access other items such as Google, etc while still listening. Some of the initial advertising is odd, but I click past that and play my music. I dont have to hsve this open to a full screen to listen to. Its great for me but im not into mainstream music, I'm strictly older trance music which I find abundantly here.

This app is excellent I love it just sitting here finding all my music I'm so üíØ happy I've been looking for an app that doesn't give me a hard time about this is it, it's so easy and words can't describe what is happening to me now it's the best 5 üåü is excellent but not enough because this is more than I expected so much more to say keep it up much love and thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è this app is awesome ‚ò∫Ô∏èüòòüòòüòò

title: Math Exercises for the brain, Math Riddles, Puzzle
description:
Increase your brain power and compete against players from around the world!
Experience the heated battle that will keep you on your toes!

Free Math Games for everyone from kids to adults. Brain games is based on principles of cognitive psychology to help you practice different mental skills: memory, attention, speed, reaction, concentration, logic, mathematics, time tables and more math quiz. 

Fight with other people in math game in multiplayer Arena in real time! 

"Quick Brain" - it is a Puzzle game with many levels and multiplayer:
- Multiplication table
- Training game with flexible settings for math (Multiply, Plus, Minus, Divide), time for questions, complexity and type of game like Test, True / false or Input of answer with keyboard.
-  2048 - puzzle with many sizes, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8 and speed level
- True / False mathematics game
- Mathematics Balance
- Schulte table
- Multiplayer Arena with leaderboards. You can fight with your friends in real time!

For all ages: games for kids, for parents and for everybody!

The main advantages:
- quick developing of memory and attention for children and adults
- efficient training of the brain
- simple and understandable process of playing
- game is available without Internet connection
- app doesn‚Äôt spend much time
- number sense

The application will be useful for all ages:
- students and kids - to master the basics of mathematics and arithmetic, learn multiplication table, prepare for math tests and exams
- adults who want to keep their mind and brain in good shape

Develop your intellectual facilities by solving various mathematical tasks as quickly as possible: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division! Limited amount of time for answering only stimulates your brain to work faster, better and more efficiently.

Mountain your Math skills by playing ¬´Quick Brain¬ª daily! Compare your records with friends, thereby motivating yourself to be the best among them.

Brain Teasers do not require special knowledge so everyone can improve their brain function through repetition and adaptation. 

In Quick Brain your main target is to reach the highest number possible within the time limit, all while dealing with the high difficulty and all the other challenges that appear as you play.

What is ¬´Quick Brain¬ª trainer? 
- Your personal trainer in developing your skills;
- Mathematics game (Multiply, Plus, Minus, Divide games);
- Educational Puzzle;
- 2048 puzzle game
- Train concentration;
- IQ trainer;
- Smart & Quick Thinking ;
- Faster Reaction Speed;
- Simple and easy to use interface;
- Designed for smartphones and tablets
- Leaderboards of players.

Boost up your IQ with the mobile app ¬´Quick Brain¬ª!

Quick Brain math games is a brain-training, where logic & thinking & math meet fun, enjoyment, amusement and lighthearted pleasure. In our App We will See How To play together. 

- We added the classic 2048 puzzle - addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! 

HOW TO PLAY in 2048 puzzle: 
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.

We in Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialQuickBrain/

Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater. ¬© Albert Einstein.
Welcome to Quick Brain, the puzzle game where you get the power of math in your hands.

Download that app for FREE now!

comments: The best üëçüíØü•∞ü•∞üòçüòçüòçüòòüòòlot of support from me. Actually I thought of dwonloading other game but your game has make me intelligent üòã and it's interesting while I'm doing nothing but your game has a feeling that makes me happy because I answer and the game asked haha Btw the best is the multiplication stage ahh it's sad that now people doesn't have time to play like your game but other shooting games like PUBG but still this is the best game ever. And BTW Name's SIZZLE 13 years old üòÅ ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

If I said thanks then this is not enough and it will never be enough. By all means, this app is remarkable and so useful. Since my childhood I used to have problems with Math and till today actually I still but with this app I am developing myself a day by day and it really works. I have a suggestion for you to make this app perfect. Try to add more games that is suitable for all ages. Like what? Algebra, geometry and Trigonometry Basics and add a particular part for High school students.

Its, well, boring. A lot of games have no total timer, you can go on indefinitely if you don't make a mistake. Which would be fine, if the there were difficulty levels that persisted across game instances. As far as I can tell, I start at level 0 every time. And I simply don't feel like spending 10 minutes on 2-1 type calculations every time in hopes it gets more challenging later on. I guess if could be meant for children...

The game is very nice, helpful to solve simple mathematical problems (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division).But there is not percentage operator which is very important in daily life. And the 2048 game is so boring!!!

The games are very challenging. They're really good for our brain. I'm enjoying the games specially that they're offline. Thank you very much for developing these games. They are very helpful to us who are getting older.

comments: There is nowhere in the app to contact you, so here it is...your Age of Voyage spinning wheel is a JOKE! The piece that moves when you spin the wheel sometimescounts the spot it is on as the FIRST move and sometimes it doesn't! I have had spins that SHOULD have landed me on a "SAIL but it doesn't because of the way it moves that I just described. SO UNFAIR!!

It's a good game overall. The only thing I would change is a little longer time on the last number called. It doesn't give you enough time when you're playing with multiple cards to hit that last number on all the cards. Pretty good payout. Hey bingo games when you can't play them because you run out of coin and they don't give you much.

I'm really liking this bingo game but had to give it 3 stars because you only get a set amount of tickets a day and the buy in for the special event games is like 3x the daily amount. To get more tickets other than to buy them you have to complete daily tasks BUT the daily tasks are only eligible in the special event games so they're unachievable. So basically this is a pay to play game after you spend all your tickets given when you first download app.

This game really sucks now! You can't finish the album cause u only win duplicate cards. For over 3 weeks, I have not been able to open my gift box and most of the games, especially any new tournament games. I've lost out on gifts from Tony and being sble to send and receive in the gift box. Fix your damn technical errors!!!!!

When i first downloaded this game it looked nothing like the ads i had seen for it. Then i discovered the more games tab at the bottom of the page and discovered it's an add on for rooms...there i found the games from the ads and many many more. There are enough games here to keep anyone busy for a long time and all different themes and types of play. I'm an avid player and love bingo. But this is quickly becoming my favorite app i've ever used. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!

title: Fishbrain - local fishing map and forecast app
description:
Over 10 million anglers trust Fishbrain to improve their fishing experience. Fishbrain has over nine million catches logged, which allows you to gain unique insights and to catch more fish. Fishbrain is your personal fishing log, map, and forecasting tool in one app.

Here‚Äôs how you level-up your fishing game with Fishbrain.

‚Ä¢ Detailed Search Functionality:  Search by the species you want to target near you.  Looking for your PB Bass?  Fishbrain can help you find it.

‚Ä¢ Explore Exact Catch Positions:  Have data on your side and get the edge you‚Äôve been looking for.

‚Ä¢ Fishing Forecast and Calendar:  Step up your game by knowing the most likely time for fish to bite.  We cover over 130+ species including the most popular Bass, Trout, Catfish, Carp, etc.  All of our information is based on real-life catch data. 

‚Ä¢ Top Baits: stop the guesswork.  Optimize each cast by using the right bait, at the right time for the species you want to hook.  

‚Ä¢ Personal Statistics: Focus on your journey and find opportunities for improvement.  Log your catches and see a statistics report on your historical performance in the fish finder app. 

‚Ä¢ Discover fishing points: Discover new and interesting locations based on popularity, recent catches, and more.

‚Ä¢ Join the Conversation: Get fishing tips and gain knowledge from the
Fishbrain community. Get Pro fishing tips on everything: from choosing the best fishing gear to best fishing time and spots near you.

‚Ä¢ Keep Track of Anglers: Know who is catching and what they‚Äôre catching, see top hotspots on the map. All the best spots around the US realtime: Florida, California, Texas and more.

‚Ä¢ Follow and get relevant updates on various fishing methods: ice fishing, sea angling, trolling and many more.

‚Ä¢ Family weekend activity: Organize a fishing adventure for your kids, based on pro tips in the app. Let it be their big catch!

‚Ä¢ Get Angler Friends: Find fellow anglers on the fishing maps, connect with anglers in your local area -- that‚Äôs right, local.

Our free version offers a lot of cool features. For more advanced fishing experience, Fishbrain Pro is available from $9.99/month. You can subscribe and pay through your Google Play account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

comments: Way too expensive, $9.99 per month is crazy. Amazon and Netflix are the same price and this app is not offering anything near what you get for those services. In the free version all fish are locked except large mouth bass. I live in Florida and fish only salt water so the free large mouth bass doesn't help me. Basically the app is useless. Also the app doesn't even tell you the best times of the day to fish.

Used to love it.. I lost the notifications that sounds like a fishing reel. I loved it!! Now it hardly ever notifies me. I havent placed it on sleep either. I have the most update version. There is no way I would pay for this app. Too buggy. I get notification for a fish caught "in my area" and when I click on it, says line snapped.New posts are irrelevant to me and my area. I'm seeing spots that are 1-2 hours away. I modified my feed and still get nothing useful. Please fix.

It's good for logging catches, seeing which spots are most popular and adding your own custom waypoints to the map - as a suggestion, could you include the ability to add gear that isn't already listed in the app? It's frustrating that I can't include the gear I use because there's no option to add an item that isn't already listed

Let me get this straight.... You get to take my money every month without actually providing a functional app?? This new update bombards me with notifications without actually allowing me to use the app. Login is completely non functional. Update: ten days later and I still can't login. Hitting 'login' does nothing. Update: the app is now working properly. Thanks

Has potential to be a very useful fishing app if it would actually let you view, filter, and organize the underlying data effectively. Like how can you not view data for a selected lake? Unfortunately it seems to have a major in being a social media app with an uncompleted minor in fishing.

title: FPlay
description:
FPlay for Android is a simple and lightweight music player, with clean interface, equalizer, bass boost and customizable colors. And what is best: it is completely open source - the source is available at https://github.com/carlosrafaelgn/FPlayAndroid

The main goal of this project is to provide the users with a fully functional music player based on lists and folders. The player itself does not consume too much memory, and respects WCAG 2.0 accessibility guidelines for colors and contrast, being friendly for color blind people, people with a few types of dyslexia, as well as for people with mild visual impairments.

FPlay can be integrated to Arduino, or other electronic board, via Bluetooth SPP - Serial Port Profile :D

The Arduino library is available on GitHub: https://github.com/carlosrafaelgn/FPlayArduino

The player also has these other features:
- Multi-window + Chromebook
- Online radio directory: SHOUTcast + Icecast
- Color and theme customization
- Native support for dyslexia-friendly typeface (improved readability)
- Ability to send track information via A2DP / AVRCP Bluetooth (tested on Android 4.0+)
- Ability to play streams from the Internet
- Volume fade in when returning from calls and from pause
- Real-time spectrum analyzer
- Fully controllable via keyboard
- Controllable via Bluetooth audio devices (tested on Android 4.0+)
- Low latency between consecutive track changes on Android 4.1+
- Full control from the notification area
- Volume control integrated with the system's control
- Resizable widget
- Programmable turn off timer
- Shuffle mode
- TalkBack
- Audio virtualization
- External USB

The player is still in a "beta stage", so there may be a few unknown bugs yet. Please, let me know if you happen to come across one of them ;)

The typeface used as the dyslexia-friendly typeface is OpenDyslexic Regular, by Abelardo Gonzalez, available at http://dyslexicfonts.com

Available in eight languages! :D

title: Truck games for kids - build a house, car wash
description:
Trucks for kids - build a house - building game where toddlers learn different types of trucks and how to build a house, arbor, mill and even swimming pool.

These games for free not only games for boys, but also for girls. If your kids are fond of cars and big trucks or anything connected with building games thematic they will be crazy of these cool tractor and trucks games for toddlers for free! Go through all engrossing levels of game and get your house, swimming pool and arbor done in the finish of one of the best building game for toddlers! You will find here many types of construction games machinery  like trucks, tractor simulator, excavator, bulldozer and many others.

CONSTRUCT and RIDE your very own construction transport is fairly easy right now! Build cool vehicles with just a few touches and then make a house and a swimming pool. First above you have to build your own transport, then fill trucks for kids with gas on the gas station and then go to the üî® house building games where you can build your dream house with the help of cars! After these free games you will have to wash your transport truck game in the car wash. Move from level to level you will know how to build a house and soon your dream house will be done!

Here you can find many types of different vehicles and lori for your child puzzle free games for boys how to build a house and play with! There is a lot of different trucks for kids to learn about construction! Teach your child basics of cars mechanics! All the transport with tractor and car games for kids is just like in real life - that‚Äôs good for education!

-CAR WASH!

Your truck got dirty after hours of building the house? No problem! Go to car wash, soap it with bubbles in free kids games, roll it through with soft brushes while learning trucks for toddlers and build house, clean it with water and dry it off so your car will shine clean in a car games for free building a house! It‚Äôs really fun for kids games to play in car wash games for kids 3 years for free!

-GAS STATION!

Fuel of your truck is low? Never mind because in  truck games for kids you can fuel your transport on the gas station. At first find where to connect fueling nose to fill the trucks with the gas. Press the button and watch your car's fuel level rising up!

If you`re an adult and busy, you can simply give your smartphone or tablet with various learning games with the house building game installed and construction vehicles, to your toddler so he will be busy with it for hours of having fun! But your baby will not only be passionate about tractor games for toddlers, but also will learn some things in game for kids 3 year old!

Voice-over: 10 different professionally recorded voice-overs, including languages like: English, Deutsch, Espanola, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese, Chinese, Arabian, and Hindi! Graphics is brilliant and colorful car games for toddlers, our designers worked hard on these truck games for kids! We`ve also cared about security of trucks for kids, so it won‚Äôt be so easy for your child to buy something in game, while you are not looking after him.

This game will be perfect for your 2-5 years old kid, if he likes tractor games, car sounds, house building games. 

Also we recommend you to view some others childrens games for boys those we created, they are fun not less than that one! :)

Contact us at feedback.gokids@gmail.com we will be happy to hear some feedback from you!

recentChanges:
We added a new building - a FORGE is here! New mini-game "Fix the transport" is here too.

We also improved some game mechanics for your comfort and intuitive playing.
Try out now! And enjoy! : )
comments: Great game. My 2 y/o very much like this game. She understands easily what to do. But parents have to watch out for the ads popping up every stage of the game. I only tried the free version because paying for it seems quite expensive for a kids game.

My grandson loves this app. He was five when he started playing and now he is in grade one and is still finding it stimulating. I tried some others but they were too advanced for him. The repetitive nature of it is stimulating and rewarding because he feels like he is doing work. But he knows what to do and it isn't overwhelming. I thought that he would find it too simple because his favorite game is Minecraft, which is very challenging. But the music and graphics really strikes a chord.
2 year old loves this game. Paid for subscription and only 1 new level unlocked. Where are the additional levels?

Grand Kids love this game. Easy for them to move through it. Even the 2 yr old. We sought out other games by this group. We have the build an island one too. Loved as much as this one. Can't wait to see what they come up with next,
Very well done app. We love it. Started before 2 yrs old (needed a little help then, but no problems now). Great animations, love the follow through with gas and cleanup too! ;)

title: AMAZE!
description:
This game will AMAZE you!

Swipe to move the ball and paint - you‚Äôve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles. 

To fill in puzzles, fill each square to unlock more addictive AMAZE maze paint puzzles.
Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!
Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square. 

Make sure you fill in puzzles COMPLETELY! If you don‚Äôt fill even one square, you‚Äôre stuck in the paint maze FOREVER!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

recentChanges: Bugs fixes for undisturbed hours of fun
comments: Its a great game, but with a game so simple how come there are so many glitches?? 5 consecutive levels freeze up during a stupid ad to where I have to back out of the game and reopen it! Dont know how much more of that i can stand, fix it or im deleting the game! Revised review! Now its every damn level!! I can't enjoy the game at all now!!!!

I like the game; however, it needs an update desperately. The game keeps freezing up, so you can't move the ball. Then it freezes up my phone where I can't even exit out of the game. I literally can't pass the level I'm on because it freezes up EVERY SINGLE TIME. It doesn't matter what mode you are on either. Sometimes, it takes a few seconds and then all of a sudden, the ball will suddenly shoot around to where you were attempting to move it, but that's rare. Im about to delete the app.

It's okay. I like the game, but theres an add that keeps pooping up, that leaves me to have to completely exit the app and re enter to play the game. Then after I play when I enter the app again, the add pops up after I play one set. The ads are a bit exesive, but other than that, I enjoy playing. It's a good way to pass the time as long as you have patience.

THIS APP IS BROKEN!! First, When You Get a new ball and you try to equip it in the 100's or somethin' you cant equip it because you can't click the Arrows!! I've Washed my phone and it still didnt help. Please fix this app. Plus, the re is impossible levels so you HAVE to watch a add to pass the level. There is repeated levels too. And too many pop up ads so turn it on airplain mode or suffer. This is my honest opinion on the app and it is fun for a puzzle game that's why I rated it two stars..
This game is awesome the problem is that it's too fast and then you get confused where you have to go fix that and you can equip the skin.

title: Modern Combat 5: eSports FPS
description:
> ‚ÄúIt plays as good as it looks.‚Äù ‚Äì IGN
> ‚ÄúAmps everything up to the next level.‚Äù  ‚Äì 148Apps 
> ‚ÄúSharp controls, impressive graphics.‚Äù  ‚Äì Pocket Gamer 

War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! 

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic‚Äôs apocalyptic plans.

You won‚Äôt find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. 
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER 
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN 
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you‚Äôre ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.


_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

Don't forget to follow us on social media:
Facebook: http://gmlft.co/FBMCGP

Instagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IG

Forum: http://gmlft.co/MC5FR

Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-notice

comments: Forced ads. Everytime I go to play a mission I get forced to watch a 30 second ad. I learned that its faster to just close the game and try again, and hope I dont get another ad. And none of the ads are skippable. I once replayed a level and got an ad while I was getting shot at. The game did not pause while the ad played.

I played this game once in 2019. I unlocked many classes like sapper ,marauder. Now I reinstalled it but I can't retrieve the data from the previous attempt. I logged in with the Google play account today but can't load the previous progress , I also checked the Google play account it still shows I made some 14 achievements.

Gameloft should be shivering with embarrassement at this failure of a game and someone needs to be fired. The disrepect they show to the players is unreal. The game is overrun with cheaters who stand outside the maps and kill everyone. Turrets still fire through walls. Every other game is filled with players who stand still but you can't shoot them but they shoot you. This game is unplayable and the european staff responsible should be fired. Scum, just scum.

I Installed this game after around 1 year, i thought this game is not p2w anymore but i was wrong this game is still filled heavily with p2w stuff, matchmaking system sucks, take my advice go ahead for call of duty mobile, there is no mean to play greedy gameloft's games where activision is giving you console like f2p games Really disappointed of gameloft

The graphics are fairly good, and so as the story line but there is a major issue that is server. I could barely play a complete match before it says network lost even when I have Wifi router connection. I don't think it's network issue may be it's your server issues...

title: Fallout Shelter
description:
** Google Play Best of 2015  **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015‚Äù ‚Äì Gizmodo 
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future‚Ä¶underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY 
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! 

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND 
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don‚Äôt let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside‚Ä¶and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

comments: I really enjoy this game! I love the fallout series as well as the elder scrolls games, Bethesda is by far the best. Now this game has some things it could use, one of those is the ability to move rooms around without destroying them, or even widen the vault a bit so you can fit three full rooms along with 2 or 3 elevators. I also wish the rarity chance was a teensy bit higher for legendary dwellers, there are more things, but I only have 500 letters to use. Fix those two and I'll update this :)

Good graphics, good gameplay, no "it is free-to-play, but pay us or wait for years to finish building", no "you will play forever no matter what mistakes you do" (you can lose and it makes you think what to do). You do not have to play each day (do not afraid of missing something or losing state). You can even select difficult level! It is something I missed from old time. One of great games for smartphone, I like it!

It feels like a game to download just to kill time, but I'm addicted to it. I love the graphics and the humor. And the only time you get ads is when you want to skip something for free, there is not a ton of ads like most other games. I love to name the characters and RP what life in the vault would be like and turn on fallout music on youtube in the background. It's the best free game I've played in a long time. Thank you so much to the developers for making us this game for free. ‚ù§Ô∏è

I love this game. And have for years. However upon getting into contact with the developer, days later they've ignored me on multiple accounts. Ive emailed them around a half dozen times and they've only responded 3 times. All of which was not helpful. And now, not only do I feel completely scammed, I feel disrespected as a player. Take this into consideration if you make a purchase. They will suck at communicating back with you.

Would be 5 stars but there's a glitch that adds 270+ hours to the daily reward and that isn't great. Edit: I have now changed my review from 4 stars to 1 star because as of the new update I am unable to actually load the game. It asked for access to media and files, which is fine, but then it started a weird download and once it finishes the game gets stuck in a frozen loading screen. Closing and reopening the app just restarts the download. Please fix and I'll change my review back to 4 star.

recentChanges:
Welcome to version 1.21
Have fun with these challenging math games.
comments: I loved these varied and exceptionally challenging math puzzles. The hints provided were helpful, but were not so obvious as to give away the answer without serious thought. You really have to think outside the box; nonlinear thought is required to figure out the underlying pattern. Once you identify the pattern, it is then straightforward to solve the puzzle.

Enjoyable and a bit challenging at times. There were a couple of problems that weren't clear how you were supposed to know to use a certain number as a reference. The clearest form of this was on one of the questions, the hint was " - 40". I dont know how I was supposed to know to subtract each answer from 40. It just seemed like an arbitrary number that you had to use the hint to know. Other than those questions, which there were only a few, I really enjoyed using this app.

Good for getting basic math practice in from what I am able to play. Unfortunately I am stuck on a level that requires multiple entries and will not allow multiple entries. I had the right answer, but could not enter it. Very frustrating. Maybe a quick tutorial on the various ways you may have to enter answers would fix this. I probably could figure it out if it isn't a bug, but there are millions of games out there. This just turned me off. Next!

Made me recall the simple rules like pemdas, also adding some "additional" rules to solve levels as they progress; many answers based on correlation of number sets. Being dyslexic, this game is/was very empowering for me, as I started out sailing through without having to write anything down to solve any of the puzzles. However, after I got stuck on level 58 (by coincidence) my shrink lowered my adderall dose and now I can't make it past level 30 without working the problems on paper. :(

Some of the puzzles are pretty difficult, but none are too difficult that they can't be completed with a little math knowledge and a bit of outside-the-box thinking. Overall, I enjoyed this app, and completing it is a good brain exercise. Some of the puzzles don't actually require math to solve, which annoyed me at first, but after doing a few I thought it was good to force my brain to think more outside the box than just simply looking for a mathematical pattern. Pretty darn good app.

title: Hairy Phonics 3
description:
The final Phonics app in the Hairies series! Learning phonics is the best way to learn to read and spell.  Now introducing, vowel-r and magic ‚Äòe‚Äô. 
Vowel-R
When the letter ‚Äòr‚Äô follows a vowel, the vowel is forced to change its sound. 

Magic-E
Magic E states when the letter sits at the end of the word it‚Äôs usually silent and strengthens the preceding vowel to say its name. 

-	Learn 9 phonemes (sounds): ar, or, er, ir, ur, a-e, o-e, i-e, o-e, u-e 
-	Guides your child through a structured sequence of learning.
-	Phonic animations link an action with the sound.
-	Trace the letters with your finger.
-	Play games to blend the phonemes into a whole word and improve understanding
-	Sound out words and understand how the digraph changes the sound of the word
-	Release 6 new Hairies at the Yeti Igloo
This is a particularly important skill for those with dyslexia. 
Designed for 4-6 year olds. 
This app is strictly educational and has no in-app purchases.


REVIEWS

Brilliant game. Children learn without realising. ‚Äì Tina Tortoise

Very good Good consolidation activities for students learning long vowels and the 'magic e' / split digraph spelling pattern. A good introduction/addition for teacher-led phonics activities. ‚Äì Ceri Williams

comments: I've tried many OCR apps (image to text converter) and none of them came close to what this app produces. Although it is still not perfect yet (which is mainly because of infinite handwriting styles), at least it doesn't produce gibberish like the other apps. I hope the algorithm keeps improving and it would be great if you could add speech for other language texts too.

Have been looking for an app to transcribe my handwritten notes to editable text for a while. Just downloaded this app after reading a positive review. The said OCR is by no means perfect, but then neither is my handwriting and so far I am actually pretty impressed. I like to save an image of the page to OneNote and then copy the transcribed text next to it. Would be great if I could setup a macro to do both in one go.

On my galaxy s9 I am using this app in tandem with quizlet (split screen view) to create a study guide. I'm surprised I couldn't find this option on google keyboard, but this is a fine alternative. Ads are annoying but never that bad, and the very empirical way the text is transcribed is much appreciated. 5 stars for functionality, overall 4.7 because ads

Top of the line, excellent for small receipts and business cards. Good for books but you might need two or three takes per page. I couldn't test it properly for handwriting during the very limited trial time allowed. Overall the development of this APP is marvelous, excellent work!

This app has been a very useful tool. I'm so grateful for the intelligence put into making it. God bless you guys. Edit. Now you can't use this app without subscription. It gives you a trial period, after which, you have to subscribe to use it. It's been good while it lasted. Goodbye, I'm uninstalling now.

title: Norton Family parental control
description:
Keeping your kids safer online requires more than managing screen time. Norton Family helps you supervise and manage your kids‚Äô online activities. 

‚Ä¢	Helps you manage your child‚Äôs remote learning environment, so you can keep your child focused on schoolwork during the school day.
‚Ä¢	Helps block unsuitable sites while your kids are surfing the Internet
‚Ä¢	Let‚Äôs you see what websites they‚Äôre visiting
‚Ä¢	Let‚Äôs you see what they‚Äôre searching for 
‚Ä¢	Let‚Äôs you see what apps they‚Äôre downloading and more.

And while Norton Family lets you set online time limits, it also helps you start open and ongoing conversations about how to build safe and smart online habits.  As a parent, it‚Äôs important to have insight into what your kids are doing. Our helpful tools allow you to monitor kids‚Äô online activities at a glance or be notified by email alerts, so you know when it‚Äôs time to talk.

‚ÄúNorton Family offers an impressive range of parental control and monitoring features for parents of today's hyper-connected kids.‚Äù Neil J. Rubenking

Reprinted from www.pcmag.com with permission @2020 Ziff Davis, LLC. All Rights Reserved.

Help your kids explore, learn, and enjoy their connected world more safely with the following features:

School Time:  Remote learning requires the internet, so pausing the internet on your child‚Äôs device is not an option. Norton Family School Time is a feature to help parents manage their child‚Äôs remote learning environment, so you can keep your child focused on schoolwork and avoid other internet distractions during the school day. (Available on Windows‚Ñ¢, Android‚Ñ¢ and iOS).

Web Supervision: Let your kids explore the Web freely, with tools that help you block unsuitable websites while keeping you in the know about which sites they‚Äôre visiting.

Time Supervision: Stay on top of how much time your kids spend on their devices.

Search Supervision: See words, terms, and phrases your kids are searching for to gain insights into their interests and help protect them from inappropriate content.

Parent Mobile App10: Stay in the loop about your kids‚Äô online activities from your Android or iOS mobile device and adjust settings when you‚Äôre on the go.

Video Supervision8: See a list of the YouTube videos your kids watch on their PCs or iOS devices and even view a snippet of each video, so you know when you need to talk.

Mobile App Supervision8: See which apps your kids have downloaded on their Android devices and choose which ones they can use.

Instant Lock: Parents can help kids take a break by locking the device so they can re-focus, or join the family at dinner. Individual devices can be unlocked with a PIN. Parents and children can still contact each other while the device is in lock mode.

Email Alerts: Receive an email when your kids attempt to visit a blocked site so that you can start a conversation about appropriate content.

Access Request: Open the lines of communication by enabling your ids too send you a note if they disagree with a blocked site or house rule. Parents can accept or reject the request via app, web portal and web browser on any device.

Monthly/Weekly Reports: Opt to receive detailed reports of what your kids are doing online, right in your email in-box


An account is required to use the Norton Family app. Use this app to set up, review, manage and customize your House Rules and Settings for each child you‚Äôve added.

8Video Supervision monitors videos that your kids view on YouTube.com. It does not monitor or track YouTube videos that have been embedded in other websites or blogs.

10Mobile app must be downloaded separately.
