comments: Useless. GPS tracking does not work, tried everything, app usually gets stuck on loading, the features are not user friendly, very limited, very clunky. It's a really slow, limited and badly designed app with inadequate features .

This app is absolute garbage. Basically abandonware as only "minor bugs" are ever fixed. Use the website,which is not much better. Just a poor product offering overall. Nothing done to address: lack of SMS tracking; lack of fingerprint login; cannot delete alerts in-app (which are NOT synced with website); saving is slow; no 2-way sync between website and app; generally unintuitive. Complete waste of money and time. Find another option. (Nothing ever came from the offer to discuss issues.)

So far I'm not impressed. Seems very easy for them to just turn off permissions for the app. The location tracking doesn't seem to work. I hit the locate now button and it said it was unable to find his device. I have no faith that this product is doing what I'd expect it to do.

Can't even log in. It keeps saying network issue but its not my network its the app. And i think its still running on non daylight savings so my son could not log into his ipad till an hour later. And i could not even log into the app to change for fix anything. And the whole program does not work or link at all with my other son's ipad.

I'm not very happy that Norton does not provide coverage for Microsoft Explorer. Also if you add a website to the unblocked list they are not unblocked immediately. They have a few kinks to work out for me.

title: Learn Languages with Music
description:
It's very easy and fun! All you have to do is play a song of your choice and listen closely to fill of the missing words in the song lyrics, by selecting the correct option.

With LyricsTraining, you will not only quickly improve your listening comprehension, but also expand your vocabulary by learning new words and expressions, improving your reading comprehension and boosting your grammar skills.

Forget about studying and memorizing endless vocabulary lists for a moment. Learn effortlessly and let your brain do the rest of the work. Just play and have fun while you practice.

‚ÄúLearning is most successful when students are relaxed, confident and enjoying their learning‚Äù
‚Äî John Truscott

‚ÄúLanguage acquisition does not require extensive use of conscious grammatical rules, and does not require tedious drill‚Äù
‚Äî Stephen Krashen

Thousands of teachers around the world already use LyricsTraining and recommend it to their students.

LyricsTraining really works!

MUSIC AND LANGUAGE LEARNING
Music stimulates learning and memorization naturally. It is just like when we were kids!

Listening to different accents and intonations helps our brain become more flexible and adaptable so that it can recognize different sounds of a new language.

You will not be able to keep yourself from singing along while you listen to the songs and follow the lyrics, which will also improve your pronunciation.

Apart from musical content, there is other content that may interest you, such as movie clips, TV shows, talks, etc. Check out our list of genres.

MAJOR FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Multiple choice and karaoke mode. Select the difficulty that best suits your level or simply enjoy synchronized video and lyrics in karaoke mode.
‚Ä¢ Bilingual dictionary and integrated translation. Press and hold any word or expression to learn its meaning or translate it into your language. (Not available for romanized languages)
‚Ä¢ Level up. Play every day to level up, complete new lyrics and earn new achievements.
‚Ä¢ Expand your vocabulary. The more you play, the more words you will get and the greater your language proficiency becomes.
‚Ä¢ Compete against other users. Try to get the best score by competing with users from your country or the rest of the world.
‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends. Create and share friends-only challenges.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress. Check your activity history to track your progress.

OVER TEN LANGUAGES
Learn English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Japanese (Romanji), Turkish, Polish, Swedish, Finnish, or Catalan.

More languages on the way.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Play three games a day for free, or switch to premium to play without limits and unlock some important features:

‚òÖ Play thousands of lyrics without waiting.
‚òÖ Translate any word or phrase without limits.
‚òÖ Access your vocabulary and your complete activity history.

COMMUNITY OF USERS
Join a great community of over 2 million users.

If you cannot find a song, write to support@lyricstraining.com, or collaborate with us by adding your favorite songs through our website: https://lyricstraining.com

What are you waiting for? Start learning by playing!

This is an amazing app l love it and I hope you guys who looking for improving their English to start enjoying this app

title: Dominoes
description:
Dominoes is definitely one of the most famous board game in the world. There are dozens of rules out there, but three modes are getting most of the attention:

- Draw dominoes: simple, relaxing, play your tiles on either side of the board. You only need to match the tile you have with one of the 2 ends already on the board.

- Block dominoes: basically the same as Draw Dominoes. The main difference is you have to pass your turn if you run out of options (whereas you can pick an extra domino from the boneyard in the previous mode).

- Dominoes All Five: slightly more complex. Each turn, you need to add all ends of the board, and count the number of pips on them. If it is a multiple of five, you score those points. A bit difficult at first but you will quickly get it!

Beautiful, simple, relaxing, easy to learn yet complex if you get to learn all the tricks! Will you be a Dominoes master?

comments: It is a good game but has its quirks. The bone pile is hidden during play and only visible when you draw from it. If you're not careful and hold the piece while you're placing, it, it will go to the closest matching piece. When the game is over, it covers the board so you can't review the game. Scoring is puzzling, for instance; our team score was almost 8000 and overnight dropped more than 2000 points. There is no way to remove deadbeat or caustic players from the team.

Love the game, the colors and play of the game is nice. but there is an error with this app...Whenever there is a draw, the computer automatically gives the round to the opponent/computer. Also, tap-to-play causes misplays. This app can be better by:. 1) Showing how many bones are left in the boneyard. 2) allowing online play with other humans. 3) making a 3-player, and 4-player option. 4) add a carribean style play mode, where you don't win by points but after a set number of games one.

Needs updates bad! The boneyard play is awful. Whether it is in my favor or not, it is ridiculous how this one pull gets the exact domino needed for an advantage, it is frustrating when you strategize to send your opponent to the yard and for them to only pull one bone nearly everytime and it's usually the exact one needed. I would be here all week describing the scenarios that I've witnessed, but overall it seems like the game leans in favor of the player of it's choice. IJS

Downloaded this game as something to help me wind down (and at first it was) but, with all the updates, it's turned into a constant source of frustration. The scripting is so obvious I can guess what domino the computer will play without even seeing their dominoes. This game has gone very downhill very quickly.

I've been playing this for about a year and have begun to notice that there are about 8 - 10 games that continually repeat, it's like being in "Groundhog Day." I didn't notice this at first, i thought it was random shuffling, but am seeing it more frequently for the last month or so... Today the game played first, starting with a 3x6 domino, then on its second play it played a double 6! Very frustrating! The game doesn't even follow its own rules, i.e., the first player starts play with...

description:
An efficient educational game for kids.

It allows to improve mental calculation skills easily and quickly.

Learn and train:
- addition
- subtraction
- multiplication
- division

The app comprises of 10+ exciting games.

Everyone will find interesting and funny things to do here.

Math games help to develop mental skills, improve memory, focus, and mental speed.

Keep your brain fit through regular math excercises.

Our games are ideal for kids making their first steps in learning math, as well as for adults who like to solve interesting puzzles and problems.

Daily exercises are great for in developing math skills.

Your brain will work faster and more efficient!

It is very good for help and test you, but they should add names to wahte each picture means like a puzzle piece! like what is it?
The math games is mentally stimulating and I find myself falling in love with mathematics.

title: Crazy Cursive Letters Lite
description:
Crazy Cursive Letters allows you to practice cursive (joined up), letter and word forming and have fun! A new crazy character/ scene is unlocked with every 4 words written correctly. 

Features include;
* Choice of cursive style letter e.g. two styles of the letter r.
* Personalised feedback to tell kids which letters they are totally awesome at and which letters they could focus on practising.
* Practice of single letters in cursive style.
* The 100 most frequent words to try in cursive style.
* Multiple Players, useful to track the progress of siblings or of up to 10 players in a class.
* 'My Words', section where you could type in the weeks spellings to practice.
* A phonics based approach supporting the writing practice.
* Left / right handed adaptation
* You can also use Crazy Cursive to help learn a new language! Select from American English, UK English, French, German, Italian or Spanish words and phonics. 

Your child can practice writing the top 100 words in cursive style and can also type in their own words to practice. Letters are sounded out phonetically to allow your child to develop skills of breaking down words which is particularly useful for children with Dyslexia. 

Thank you to the Teachers, Children and Parents of Fairlawn School London for your support and feedback. Special thanks to Fairlawn Teachers for being inspiringly Crazy for Cursive!

10 Benefits of Teaching Cursive Handwriting 

1.Relative ease in introducing cursive penmanship to preschoolers. 
2.Prevents reversals and confusion of letters 
3.Enhances spelling ability 
4.Develops internal control systems that can be used as tool for learning 
5.Potential for errors are diminished 
6.Improved reading skills 
7.Enforces the skills for patterns in reading and writing 
8. Prevents erratic spaces between letters and words 
9. Helps Left Handed Children 
10.Use as a tool to put thoughts on paper quickly and easily 

Conclusion: 
We should teach our children ‚ÄòCursive First, Print Later‚Äô. 

Source: Samuel L. Blumenfield, "How Should We Teach Our Children to Write? Cursive First, Print Later!" 

The British Dyslexia association recommend that children learn the continuous cursive style. The cursive style has some significant advantages for Dyslexic students. The key advantages to this system are: 

* By making each letter in one movement, children‚Äôs hands develop a ‚Äòphysical memory‚Äô of it, making it easier to produce the correct shape; 

* Because letters and words flow from left to right, children are less likely to reverse letters which are typically difficult (like b/d or p/q); 

* There is a clearer distinction between capital letters and lower case; 

* The continuous flow of writing ultimately improves speed and spelling.

title: Storytel: Audiobooks and E-books
description:
Enjoy unlimited access to listening and reading of audiobooks and e-books in English and other languages.

Find your favorite new stories through personal recommendations ‚Äì discover everything from current bestsellers to acclaimed thrillers, unforgettable novels, and gripping biographies. 

UPGRADE YOUR LISTENING & READING EXPERIENCE

Popular features include:

‚Ä¢ Download in advance, or stream on the go.
‚Ä¢ Switch seamlessly between listening and reading.
‚Ä¢ Adjust listening speed.
‚Ä¢ Chromecast integration.
‚Ä¢ Pre-set snooze with the sleep function.
‚Ä¢ Set your own bookmarks and make notes.
‚Ä¢ Discover new favorites through personal recommendations.
‚Ä¢ Share your own book recommendations with friends.
‚Ä¢ Let your child explore the library of children‚Äôs books with Kids Mode.

recentChanges:
More insect spray applied to rid the app from a few tiny foul bugs. As a result - improved functionality!

No major new features this time, but the app, like a house, needs to be kept clean and have its features polished and upgraded.
comments: Everything is ok... But the auto renewal thing is Irritating.. what if after one time, we don't have much time to listen the app.. but still it will be keep renewing the plan... Please remove it... And please keep a option of Rupay card too.. as not every person have MasterCard or Visa card.. Cos those who don't have... They have to borrow the money for it...üôÅ

The best app to listen to Marathi and English audio books at a very affordable price. This is the only provider that has wide variety of Marathi audio books that I was not able to find anywhere else. I was only interested in Marathi books and recently Storytel added a subscription option for Marathi only content at even less monthly subscription price. That's really awesome. App is also good, never hanged or created any issues. New audio player is better than last one and I am sure the team would be improving the player further. Short stories are excellent and there are frequent new releases. These are really good if you want to have a quick fun read/listen and lighten your mood or learn something new quickly. Statistics section is also good to understand your listening habits. 5 Stars for providing us with such a good variety of audio books and podcasts. Few things that can make the app better 1- Support for web based player so that we can also use it on PC. 2- Pause the audio when there is a notification on mobile. The app currently keeps audio playing in background if there is a notification. Most of audio apps pause the audio and after the notification sound, resumes the audio 3- Increase library content for latest English audio books (there are review or summaries available for latest books but feel that there is lack of latest English content compared to other providers). 4- Separate section for podcasts and books. Right now podcasts are mixed with books which for me is bit confusing. I start listening thinking that it is a book and then realize that its actually a podcast 5- Maybe have a modern color and look for the app. Current app works great, but looks a bit outdated. Also add support for light and dark modes 6- If possible, add option to buy books so that we can keep them forever and can listen to them anytime later even if the subscription expires. Also, search feature needs improvements. If I search for something, usually there are no results. Every time I have to depend on the curated lists or book tips section to find something that I would like to listen.

It seems impossible to search for anything. I would assume that I have to press the magnifying glass and then enter search terms, but nothing happens. EDIT: After further inspection, it turns out that the heading "Search" on top of the screen is not a heading, it becomes the search field when tapped. The big magnifying glass in the middle of the screen is not functional. Not very intuitive to me.

Really good app/service. I rated 4/5 because it could use some improvements to get even better. I like that with a monthly subscription I have access to all the titles in the library - unlike other services that charge the monthly fee plus credits and/or extra money to buy the book. The selection is decent, pretty good on latest releases, but I would like to see more old books too. It would be nice if the chapters were actually named like the chapters in the book instead of just numbers.

1) Too many notifications - I expect from an app I pay for to "sit" quietly and wait for me to decide when and if I need it, but not remind me twice a day that I have to do something with it. 2) Not user friendly - it took me some time to find the search hidden somewhere behind the menu. It was quite difficult for me to find books in English. 3) Quite limited number of books in English. At least for Bulgaria.

title: Bowling Crew ‚Äî 3D bowling game
description:
Join 10 000 000 community and play Bowling Crew ‚Äì The World‚Äôs #1 3D bowling game!

Challenge your friends or play 1v1 matches with worthy opponents from all over the world. This is the best choice for bowling fans and one of the most popular mobile games of all time!

Switch between fascinating bowling balls to knock down all ten pins and get a strike! Win epic PvP-battles to gain rewards. Level up to win even more bowling matches and climb to the top of this free, fun multiplayer game.

Wargaming brings you legendary online multiplayer games to play with your like-minded friends.

Bowling Crew features:

INSTANT MATCHES
We will quickly find you a skill-appropriate opponent. Every match lasts no longer than 3 minutes. No more waiting ‚Äì play online anytime, anywhere.

CHALLENGE OF THE DAY
Test your skills on alleys with nonstandard rules every day. Show everyone how you're rolling!

SEASONS
Every two weeks you have an opportunity to participate in a competitive season with unique prizes. Win matches, gather tokens and collect season rewards!

FANTASTIC GRAPHICS
We take special care of graphics. Our breathtaking alleys will dive you in a fascinating atmosphere of one of iconic world epochs (often, not real).

AND MORE!
-revolutionary gameplay, which is easy to learn and difficult to master;
-millions of players, who are waiting to be challenged;

-weekly leagues, where you can advance and unlock new bowling balls;
-easter eggs, that are hidden in every bowling lane ‚Äì try to find them all;

Welcome to Bowling Crew! Compete with your friends for the ‚ÄòKING OF BOWLING‚Äô title.
First sports game from World of Tanks Blitz and World of Warships Blitz creators.

recentChanges:
New season starts now! Here is the news:

- More rewards for happy owners of the Season Pass.

Good luck on the lanes!
comments: There is far too much luck and not enough strategy in this game. One can use the same level balls, lined up on the same dot, pointed in the same direction, on the same alley, use the same swing; and one week you get strikes or 9s. Next week, tons of splits. The flower pin arrangement is a very good example. The game does not reward figuring out strategy. It also does not provide enough opportunities to upgrade balls. It also does a poor job of pairing u against opponents with same ball level.

Fun! All free for me so far. Update: I still really enjoy playing this game. The graphics are incredible and the ways the balls, pins and alleys interact seems to be 100% true to the laws of physics. Sometimes I'll get startled by the ball or pins shooting back in my face or I'll burst out in a laugh when something unexpected happens. This is still one of my go-to games even when I'm losing.

Your game is the best bowling, most realistic and I used to bowl pro. But it freezes up constantly. Its really frustrating when your bowling for 6,000. I've probably lost 15,000 easy. Please fix the freezing! The lower right side still freezes my stick. I like the changes, however, the one u call Rabbit, 2configuration of 5 pins. These games r to challenge yourself.the only way to get a strike is by accident. Please change the one, no fun.

This app is filled with a bunch of bots. The whole system is rigged. What a disappointment. The balls don't get any better. How I know it's rigged and you aren't playing against live players is try and forfeit in the last frame beforeit even begins. Miraculously it shows the other persons score over those 3 frames when there wasn't even enough time to bowl those 3 frames. Rigged!!!

The game is very nice to play, however, when and if you purchase certain items, they don't tell you that if you don't have that particular ball in play you have to WAIT until that ball Opens up for you. Therefore, you purchased something that may not be available to you when you purchase it! So you have to keep playing, just to see your purchased item! NOT GOOD.

title: CIELL
description:
The Comics for Inclusive English Language Learning (CIELL) project aims to develop the competences of second language teachers by promoting the use of comic art, and other visual representations of knowledge. Another goal of the project to enhance the quality of language teaching materials used for teaching writing as a  second language and support the needs of dyslexic learners in a socially inclusive manner.

Dyslexia is a specific learning difference characterized by difficulties with word decoding, spelling, handwriting, reading, memory and attention span which affects around  10% of the population. Dyslexic-type difficulties also cause challenges in writing in another language, which is often assessed in high-stakes testing contexts and is an essential skill in higher education across Europe. Therefore there is strong need for new tools and raising teachers‚Äô awareness of inclusive practices in teaching second language writing to dyslexic students.

The CIELL project is a collaboration between comic artists, language teachers and learning technology researchers, to create innovative open educational resources that enrich teaching practice  and support dyslexic learners.  The CIELL project is an extension of the ERASMUS+ ViLi project (https://www.viliproject.eu/) that aims to improve the visual literacies of educators, making learning more visual through static (e.g. comics, mind maps), dynamic (e.g. video) and interactive visuals (e.g. virtual reality).  The CIELL project further develops static visual representations in learning.

title: Monster Trucks Game for Kids 2
description:
If your kids love all things monster trucks, Then they will love this game! Monster Trucks racing game for young kids and toddlers!

Designed for young Children and toddlers between ages 2 to 8 years old, Simple controls to drive the monster trucks along the course. the truck never flips ensuring your child always gets to the finish line! 

Race against other trucks, Which slow down when they are ahead, to give your child the best chance of winning each race!

Fun big buttons to Jump, Beep the horn and change the music track for lots of fun sounds.

Crush the cars along the course with the monster machines, Collect stars, Fireworks and balloon popping are at the end of each level to give more excitement to the kids playing.

There is 4 mini games included.
Balloon Pop
Memory Cards
Puzzles
Coloring pages

With 15 cool looking monster trucks across 42 levels to blaze across, will create hours of fun for your toddlers.

Monster Trucks Kids Game helps your child understand the educational mechanics of using mobile and tablet devices. with puzzles, memory card and heaps of fun racing action.

Features:
* 15 Monster Trucks to choose from
* 42 Levels to play
* Fun Cartoon HD graphics
* 5 different kids music sound tracks for the child to switch between.
* Cute Monster trucks, engines, horns + much more vibrant sounds 
* Balloon pop game & Fireworks at the end of each race.
* Mini Games such as Puzzles, Coloring pages, Memory Cards & Balloon Pop
+ much more.

Privacy Information:
As parents ourselves, Razmobi takes children's privacy and protection very seriously. We do not collect any personal data.  This app does contain advertising as that allows us to give you the game for free ‚Äì ads are carefully placed so kids are least likely to accidentally click on them. and ads get removed on the actual race screen. This app includes the option for adults to unlock or buy additional in-game items with real money to enhance game play and removing ads. You may disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings.

If you're having any problems with this app, or would like any updates/enhancements, feel free to contact us at webnowau@gmail.com. We would love to hear from you as we are committed to updating all our games and apps for the best possible user experience.

comments: Why are there ads in this children's game. Let's put it like this you get through the first level and then it asks if you want to double your reward by watching a video. so you click and it's about 7/11 petrol station. in what world does a kid need to know about a petrol station. he don't drive a Car on the streets. Get rid of the ads jeeeze.
Get the ads out of the toddler game or limit them more! Poorly done! I might as well play it for him so I can close the ads he can't read!
My 2YR old grandson loves it, though too many ads

So my son loves this game. BUT it sucks because it has way too many ads for a toddler game. He has to hand it back to me every few minutes because he can't get out of an ad. I suggest not downloading it. I would uninstall it, but my son enjoys the game too much.
My Grandson loves this game & he's only 4 years old. Keep up the good worküëçüòò

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.üëà

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

recentChanges: Fix screen issues
comments: Could mix things up a little. Have different goals, maybe some times levels, maybe some with more differences. Otherwise a good solid play, not overtaken by ads & so far, no political ads!!

Challenging and great pictures. Very clear and interesting photography. Zoom is helpful and pictures don't blur when using it. I like the sound effect on sometimes and sometimes not so it is nice to have a choice. Also the adds are not annoying and do not pop up during game play. I like that I can choose any picture to play. Hints are helpful for that bugger at the end I just can't find. I like the star indicating how many I have left to find. And not having a timer is a huge plus to me.
Fun game, pictures are great. Would love if it told you where the pictures were taken. I would recommend this Find the Differences game

This is a very fun game to play and relax. It has a nice mix of easy, moderate, and challenging screens. There was an earlier section where the programming was messed up and you could only indicate the differences on the bottom screen. If you touched the upper screen it gave you an X and took away some of the heart, but would not let it replenish itself. I very much prefer 5 differences to 10 per challenge.

The pictures are pretty similar all the way through the game, going through maybe 10 different themes like buildings, rooms, table settings, etc. The puzzles are not too difficult, and the devs didn't make the game cheesily difficult with tiny little differences to spot. Because of that, each level takes between 15 seconds and 2 minutes, making this a perfect little time waster.

title: 100 Plus Kids Phonics Words
description:
100 Plus Phonics Words is an existing and fun educational tool to help your child learn the basics of reading using. Using synthetic phonics training your child will learn over 100 commonly used words by kindergarten (infant school) children. 

This is an engaging and rewarding learning experience that will help your child improve their reading and spelling ability. Each word uses interactive sounds with the use of great visuals.
Children listen to the sound of the letter, followed by the phonics sounds of a word. They then use these sounds to form the word being spelled. 

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢	Great for weekly reading both in and out of school.
‚Ä¢	Easy to use interface that can help your child learn a word a day.
‚Ä¢	Letters, Phonics Sounds and Spoken Words.
‚Ä¢	Over 100 interactive word exercises to teach kids Reading with synthetic phonics.
‚Ä¢	Fun and colorful images.
‚Ä¢	This app is great during self-study, but even better with the parent.

title: Kids Doodle - Color & Draw Free Game
description:
Kids Doodle, the BEST android drawing app for kids!

Kids Doodle is particularly designed for kids with super easy-to-use painting on photo or canvas. 

It has endless bright colors and 24 beautiful brushes, such as glow, neon, rainbow, crayon and sketchy, etc.

App supports unique "movie" mode, which can play back kid's artwork like a small film. Children love it so much!

The built-in gallery stores both kids drawing picture and drawing procedure. Kids can continue their drawing whenever they want, or "movie" their previous masterpiece anytime they would love.

‚Ä®GAME FEATURES:
* paint on photo or canvas‚Ä®* 24 brushes, such as glow, neon, fireworks, spark, star, rainbow, crayon, spray, ribbon, etc‚Ä®
* bright colors

title: Dyslessia
description: The Dyslessia app aims to provide free supplemental tools to help students with dyslexia strengthen their reading comprehension, phonemic awareness, and spelling through assistive technology. The app utilizes a multi-sensory approach using sounds and colors to teach the concepts in a more effective manner. The app may not yet be compatible with newer Android devices.

title: LibriVox AudioBooks : Listen free audio books
description:
Thousands of people reveal that the invention of audio books has been a beautiful thing in their life.

‚òÖ If you have ever tried audiobooks and realized they are your thing, you must download and try Free Librivox Audible books

‚òÖ Free Librivox Audio books provides incredible audible books, audio versions of classic books and fairy tales such as Pride and Prejudice, Romeo and Juliet, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, Grimm‚Äôs Fairy Tale, English Fairy Tales, New Arabian Nights, Book of a Thousand Nights and a Night, Frog Prince, ect 

‚òÖ Listening to great audiobooks and you can immerse yourself in literature everywhere, every time. 

‚òÖ Free Librivox Audible books App allows you to multitask and consume a lot of information when you wouldn't be able to read. You can listen to audiobooks when you are driving, doing chores or working out. 

‚òÖTrust me my friends, scrolling Facebook will never help you fall asleep but our App can help you. You can listen to your audiobook and set your sleep timer. Listening to classic books and fairy tales will help you increase imagination, fall asleep fast, have a peaceful night and sweet dreams. title: Colors for Kids, Toddlers, Babies - Learning Game
description:
Colors is one of our fun and simple educational games for kids aged 2-5 years old. The colors games will introduce the basic colors for toddlers to your baby. The colours games will help your child learn colors name in different languages and build associations with different objects such as fruit, animals and others.
The main features of the color games:
1) Learning colors: red, pink, gray, brown, purple, blue, green, yellow and orange. So, your baby will learn 9 colors for kids in total. All the colors for babies are illustrated by three images with the objects of the same color.
2) Learning colours in many languages: English, Spanish, Russian, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Turkish, Chinese, Vietnamese and some others. Multilingual learning colors for kids free is useful for those children who plan to study foreign languages in the future. Each color name of our baby learning games is voiced by a native speaker with perfect pronunciation and clear diction.
3) Playing shapes and colors games for kids your baby will enrich vocabulary and broaden outlook, as our colors games for kids contain a lot of new objects and words.
4) Our learning colours games for kids consist of 3 mini educational games for kids kindergarten. With these colours games for kids your toddler will play colors and learn colors properly.
5) You can download color games for toddlers for free. Color games for kids free help save family budget without compromising quality of baby‚Äôs education.
6) Our baby colour games train fine motor skills, memory, attentiveness, perseverance, curiosity and other skills that will help your child learn better at school in the future.
The learning colours games for kids can be recommended as:
- learning games for toddlers age 2 to learn colors toddler free;
- learning games for toddlers age 3 for learning colors for toddlers free;
- educational games for 4 to 5 year kid to colors for kids learn.
How to play our color games for babies:
On the main screen of the colors and shapes for kids app free preschool there are three doors. Behind these doors there are mini educational games for kids nursery which will teach your toddler colors for children.
- Opening the first door of the baby learning apps, with an inscription ‚ÄúLearn‚Äù on it, your child will get to know what the shapes and colors for toddlers look like. The game provides learning colors name in english and other languages. The baby learning games for infants will also show what items of everyday life are usually painted in these colors. Among the items of the learn colors for toddlers game there will be fruit, vegetables, animals, trees, plants and other objects such as the sun, a heart, etc. For example, the yellow color in the learning games for kids is illustrated by a lemon, a chicken and the sun. While the red color in the children learning free apps is demonstrated by a heart, a strawberry and a tomato.
- Behind the second door of the learn colors games, with an inscription ‚ÄúPlay‚Äù, your baby will see a wall with three picture frames of different colors. Then, a square of a certain color appears in the bottom of the screen. The toddler is to decide which frame corresponds with the color of the square and drag the square into it. It can be considered as a kind of coloring for kids. Such baby coloring games are especially useful for training fine motor skills.
- Behind the third door of our children games free your toddler will see a circle painted in one of the learned colors. Under the circle there will be three studied objects of different colors. The little player of coloring for toddlers free is to decide what object matches with the given color. 
All the games for learning and fixing knowledge of colors were developed in cooperation with children's pedagogists and psychologists. The game interface is so clear and intuitive that playing it will not cause the slightest difficulty among little children.

title: Readot - Copy Text to Read iT
description:
Readot - The Reading Robot helps you to automate the task of reading textual contents. Enabling this service is very easy and useful if you don't want to read and strain your eyes. Readot comes to the rescue of automating reading task for you. It supports multiple languages. The history of copied texts will be maintained for future reference or to listen again. You can also share the copied text to others from the history. The app provides you handy feature of adjusting the voice speed (Speech rate) and voice pitch (Vocal frequency). The app is also useful for Dyslexia Patients. You can also save the text from history as audio file!

How to use Readot?
- Enable Readot service in the Readot control panel
- Feel free to go to any application
- Simply copy the text that you prefer
- Sit back and RELAX. Readot will read the text for you

FAQ:
1. Is Readot free?
Ans: Yes Readot is absolutely free and always will be.

2. I cannot listen to anything!
Ans: Ensure the phone volume is up

3. Phone's volume is up but still cannot listen to anything!
Ans: Ensure you have selected proper language in the 'Options' and also ensure if any TTS (Text To Speech) application is installed or enabled (Recommended: Google Text-to-speech).

4. Readot works offline?
Ans: Yes, Readot works offline. However you need Internet to download the languages if your phone doesn't contain it.

Note: Our App requires TTS engine installed in the phone (Usually it will be preinstalled in most of the android phones).

I love this app help me with understanding on whole lot of documents I wasn't able to before thank you

title: FREE NOW (mytaxi) - Taxi Booking App
description:
FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) is a licensed ride-hailing app for taxis in 10 European countries. Book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS
1. Enter your destination
2. Book a taxi near you
3. Track your taxi driver's arrival
4. Pay your fare easily through the app

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Prebook a taxi up to 4 days in advance (e.g. for an airport transfer)
‚Ä¢ Hassle-free in-app payment with your credit card
‚Ä¢ Share your ride so friends and family know where you are
‚Ä¢ Rate your driver and let others know how much you enjoyed your taxi ride
‚Ä¢ Save your home and work addresses and book a taxi even faster

SIMPLIFY YOUR BUSINESS TRIPS
Automatically collect your receipt by email after each trip paid through the app or skip manual expense reportings after each business trips by using a FREE NOW business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER
Book a cab last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Do you need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order a cab with our app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREE NOW pickup point within your Terminal.
FREE NOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including: London Heathrow/City/Gatwick/Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, Lisbon, D√ºsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin Tegel and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT TAXI FOR YOU
Taxi XL: Cab with more than 4 seats (vans)
Taxi Wheelchair: Accessible cabs
Taxi Eco: Eco-friendly taxis with electric, gas or hybrid drive
Exec: Luxury cab for business passengers (only in Dublin & Cork)
Match: Share a cab and travel expenses (available in Limerick, Warsaw, Hamburg and Dublin)

SHARE YOUR TAXI EXPERIENCE
Invite friends and family to try out FREE NOW with your personal gift code which you can find in the app and earn credits for your next cab ride.

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE
The FREE NOW cab service is available across 9 countries in around 100 European cities, among them:
UNITED KINGDOM: Brighton, Edinburgh, London, Manchester, Nottingham, Oxford, Reading, Derby, Leicester
IRELAND: Cork, Dublin, Galway, Limerick, Waterford
GERMANY: Aachen, Augsburg, Berlin, Bochum, Bonn, Bremen, Cologne, Dortmund, Dresden, D√ºsseldorf, Duisburg, Essen, Erlangen, Frankfurt, Gelsenkirchen, Hamburg, Hannover, Ingolstadt, Leipzig, L√ºbeck, Mannheim, Munich, M√ºlheim/Ruhr, Nuremberg, Offenbach, Potsdam, Stuttgart, Westerland (Sylt), Wiesbaden
AUSTRIA: Salzburg, Vienna
POLAND: Katowice/Silesian Agglomeration, Krakow, Poznan, Tricity (Gdansk/Sopot/Gdynia), Warsaw, Wroc≈Çaw
ITALY: Milan, Rome, Turin
PORTUGAL: Lisbon, Porto
SPAIN: Barcelona, Madrid, Sevilla, Valencia
ROMANIA: Bucharest

FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) and Hailo joined forces in 2016 to keep you moving as UK's and Ireland's leading taxi and app.

SUPPORT
If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions. Alternatively, please get in touch at uk.support@free-now.com in the UK, or ireland.support@free-now.com in Ireland.

comments: I always have to put the reference times and change the account within the organisation to make a booking via my company's account. On top of this, I got a notification saying I couldn't use my company's payment method when my colleagues could. Please fix this because otherwise, it is a great app.

The app is severely bugging, it doesn't seem to connect me anymore to any possibility (neither drive, taxi, scooter or even cars...). It's unusable. When asking for a drive or taxi, it just show a bumpy taxi icon, and after not even 2min it goes back to my research like I haven't made any request. Very very disappointed. This was working perfectly before and noy anymore.

This app could not be worse. Signed in with facebook, ordered a ride, ride never showed up, got charged for it. Now it wont let me log in because my email address is already registered....that's why I am trying to sign in and not register. Did anyone test this app before releasing?

I chose this app because it indicated that the price for my journey wold be between 87 - 110 euros. On arrival at my destination I was presented with a bill for 159 euros. I don't think I would be inclined to recommend this app
So far no problems with this app doesn't take that long to arrive unlike when calling a cab over the phone and the prices are reasonable

title: 100 PICS Quiz - Guess Trivia, Logo & Picture Games
description:
100 PICS Quiz is the world's most popular app for guess the picture, brain teaser, logo, trivia and puzzle games.

With new quiz packs added every week, our puzzle and logo quiz game app offers:

‚óè Over 10,000 pictures to guess
‚óè Over 100 quiz topics, travel games, and picture puzzle games
‚óè New game pack categories added regularly
‚óèPerfect word and trivia games for the whole family
‚óèTravel games without wifi for on-the-go quizzes and challenges

DOWNLOAD NOW
‚óè Increasing difficulty: great for beginners and pros alike
‚óè Use less clues = Win more coins and quiz packs!
‚óè Use coins for hints and to get more quiz and puzzle games packs
‚óèGet a free quiz pack everyday, when returning to the app

PERFECT FOR ALL INTERESTS
‚óè Great word games, travel games, trivia quizzes, puzzle games and brain teasers.
‚óè Practice spelling common words in easy quiz packs like ‚ÄòA is for‚Ä¶‚Äô
‚óè Friendly, funny word and photo puzzle games; guess the Animals, Games, Sweets, Fairy Tales, Pets, Emojis, pop and logo quizzes and more.

100 PICS QUIZ Categories include:

LOGO
‚óè Like a challenge? Love to guess and 'name that Logo?‚Äô We have tons of Logo quiz packs, with one included for FREE!
‚óè Loads more Guess the logo-based quiz packs such as Food, Holidays, Bands, Candy, TV Show and Movies, Game shows, and French!


EMOJIS :D
‚óè Do you love emoji-based quizzes? We have 100‚Äôs of them!
‚óè Guess the Emoji packs 1-5, Movie and Christmas themed Emojis!


SEASONAL QUIZ PACKS
Get in the mood for quizzes and challenges all year round with our special Seasonal sets -

‚óè Winter, Spring, Summer, Fall/Autumn
‚óè Halloween, Thanksgiving

TV, MOVIES & CELEBS
‚óè Movies Stars picture quiz pack
‚óè Many more picture quizzes and brain teasers available; Movies, Movie Heroes, Movie Villains, Movie Sets and Quotes, TV Stars, Actresses, Actors, Oscar winners, Celeb Facebook profiles and Soap Stars.

‚óè Guess the Music Stars, Band Logos, Instruments, Album Covers, Song, Song Puzzles (Emoji).

SOCCER

NOSTALGIA 
‚óè If you love looking back then look no further‚Ä¶
‚óè Lots of throwback brain teasers and guessing games based on the 70s, 80s, 90s, 00s, Retro Logos, Classic Television, History, News Headlines, Shadows, Retro Toys, Halloween & Christmas.
‚óèClassic Toys and Gadgets trivia packs for vintage fans!

comments: This is a game with a really fun format, but with frequent irritating problems. It offers a free puzzle every day, but very seldom can you actually download that puzzle, or even see it in your available puzzles list. You can watch ads to get Clues, but lately that's been causing the app to crash at times so that you have to restart it. Also, some of the pictures are quite interesting and merit closer study, but as soon as they are revealed they vanish almost instantly.
I love this game and it can be very easy and hard but I love the animals topic and characters I rate it 4 out of 5
Cant finish level as it wont show letters to finish puzzle.... its telephone pole but no o's or n's. Also can't download any free daily pack anymore.

I gave this game three stars because the commercials are way to long. This game should be call 100 minutes of commercials. The game is a lot of fun, but looking at long, boring commercials that they show over and over is the big real challenge!
Excellent game. Makes you think a bit. Support is excellent.

title: Mnemonic A-Z
description:
This fun and powerful app makes it easy for the beginning reader to remember the letters of the alphabet. It is a visual tool that uses a picture-word association to provide a memory bridge for children to remember sounds and letters.

Benefits of mnemonics:
‚Ä¢ learning becomes more fun
‚Ä¢ more effective compared to other conventional means, such as repetition and rote learning
‚Ä¢ helps improve reading ability in children with dyslexia
‚Ä¢ helps enhance both short-term and long-term memory
‚Ä¢ enhances imagination with strongly visualized graphics
‚Ä¢ helps to break monotony associated with rote learning

Features:
- Clear and good quality audio
- Memory-recall activities

If you have suggestions or comments on how we can improve this app, whether in content or functionality, please send us your feedback. If you feel this app is useful, please share it with your friends. 

e-mail us at: admin@e-unik.com.my

title: LetraKid‚úçPRO: Learn to Write Letters. Tracing ABC
description:
Great game for preschool and primary school kids to learn handwriting.
LetraKid is an educational game for kids 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years old that can help them to learn to write print block an pre cursive, while having fun when doing so!
Alphabet, ABCs letters, 0-9 numbers, shapes and various funny tracing exercises are included in practice worksheets.

****** 5/5 stars EducationalAppStore.com ******

WHAT KIDS CAN LEARN FROM THIS GAME

‚Ä¢ Recognize letter shapes and perfect alphabet pronunciation
‚Ä¢ The correct letter formation as learned in school: start, checkpoints, strokes direction, order etc. Difficulty Levels 1 and 2 with assisted writing are designed to focus on the letter formation.
‚Ä¢ Develop fine motor skills for handwriting activity. Difficulty Levels 3 to 5 with freehand writing activities will focus on this improvement to help maximize confidence and form when writing.
‚Ä¢ Playing with a stylus pen will also help to improve standard pencil grasp. Any stylus compatible with the device will work.

MAIN FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 16 languages with full support for interface, human native voices for letter/numbers pronunciation and full official alphabets.
‚Ä¢ 3 popular letter formation rules that will provide flexibility for picking the right stroke order and direction for the child. Vital for improving grasp on key terms and rulings within handwritting.
‚Ä¢ Makes use of the 10 most used fonts in classes all over the world for learning pre cursive and print block handwritting: ZB style, HWT style, DN style, German(Hamburg) style, NSW (AU), Victoria Modern (AU), KIWI(NZ), UK style, NORDIC and Euro Latino.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Left and Right handwriting rules. This is a writing app for lefties also.
‚Ä¢ 5 difficulty levels with AUTO and LOCK settings, ranging from assisted writing for beginners, up to real freehand writing with minimal support and strict evaluation.
‚Ä¢ 4 set of glyphs: ABC (full alphabet for upper case letters), abc (full alphabet for lower case letters), 123 (numbers from 0 to 9) and a special set of shapes for funny exercises.
‚Ä¢ 5 progression levels, color coded for each glyph that allows parents and teachers an instant evaluation of the progression and most exercised letters at the alphabet level.
‚Ä¢ 16 funny sticker rewards that will unlock after progression milestones are reached. Writing practice made fun.
‚Ä¢ 3 profile slots with 50 funny avatars and name customization that will save independently the settings and the progression.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Landscape and Portrait orientations.

GREAT IN THE CLASSROOM!

With a unique and real-time feedback feature as well as complex tracing evaluation algorithms, LetraKid - Learn to Write is one of a kind tracing app.

This is a new approach, focused on creating a fun game by utilizing handwritting mechanics itself. This avoids using distracting random rewards or secondary game mechanics that can break and confuse the learning process, optimizing learning progress and educational appeal to children.

The real time feedback will give both audio and graphic clues about the quality of the tracing and will adjust with difficulty level.
Our ABC and 123 tracing evaluation algorithms allow for an accurate and fun reward, using a 5 star rating for each exercise. This engages and motivates the kids to progress and to strive for more.

DESIGNED for KIDS

‚Ä¢ No irritating pop-ups.
‚Ä¢ No collection of personal data
‚Ä¢ Game settings are behind a parental gate. This can be enabled, and ensures a child to work with a certain font, formation rule, difficulty level and various other features for total specification to their needs.
‚Ä¢ This game can be useful for kids with autism, adhd, dyslexia or dysgraphia conditions.

A perfect educational game for kids to learn handwriting with ABCs and 123s either in kindergarten, pre-school, home-school, primary school or using Montessori method.
descriptionHTML:
Great game for preschool and primary school kids to learn handwriting.
LetraKid is an educational game for kids 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 years old that can help them to learn to write print block an pre cursive, while having fun when doing so!
Alphabet, ABCs letters, 0-9 numbers, shapes and various funny tracing exercises are included in practice worksheets.

****** 5/5 stars EducationalAppStore.com ******

WHAT KIDS CAN LEARN FROM THIS GAME

‚Ä¢ Recognize letter shapes and perfect alphabet pronunciation
‚Ä¢ The correct letter formation as learned in school: start, checkpoints, strokes direction, order etc. Difficulty Levels 1 and 2 with assisted writing are designed to focus on the letter formation.
‚Ä¢ Develop fine motor skills for handwriting activity. Difficulty Levels 3 to 5 with freehand writing activities will focus on this improvement to help maximize confidence and form when writing.
‚Ä¢ Playing with a stylus pen will also help to improve standard pencil grasp. Any stylus compatible with the device will work.

MAIN FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 16 languages with full support for interface, human native voices for letter/numbers pronunciation and full official alphabets.
‚Ä¢ 3 popular letter formation rules that will provide flexibility for picking the right stroke order and direction for the child. Vital for improving grasp on key terms and rulings within handwritting.
‚Ä¢ Makes use of the 10 most used fonts in classes all over the world for learning pre cursive and print block handwritting: ZB style, HWT style, DN style, German(Hamburg) style, NSW (AU), Victoria Modern (AU), KIWI(NZ), UK style, NORDIC and Euro Latino.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Left and Right handwriting rules. This is a writing app for lefties also.
‚Ä¢ 5 difficulty levels with AUTO and LOCK settings, ranging from assisted writing for beginners, up to real freehand writing with minimal support and strict evaluation.
‚Ä¢ 4 set of glyphs: ABC (full alphabet for upper case letters), abc (full alphabet for lower case letters), 123 (numbers from 0 to 9) and a special set of shapes for funny exercises.
‚Ä¢ 5 progression levels, color coded for each glyph that allows parents and teachers an instant evaluation of the progression and most exercised letters at the alphabet level.
‚Ä¢ 16 funny sticker rewards that will unlock after progression milestones are reached. Writing practice made fun.
‚Ä¢ 3 profile slots with 50 funny avatars and name customization that will save independently the settings and the progression.
‚Ä¢ Full support for both Landscape and Portrait orientations.

GREAT IN THE CLASSROOM!

With a unique and real-time feedback feature as well as complex tracing evaluation algorithms, LetraKid - Learn to Write is one of a kind tracing app.

This is a new approach, focused on creating a fun game by utilizing handwritting mechanics itself. This avoids using distracting random rewards or secondary game mechanics that can break and confuse the learning process, optimizing learning progress and educational appeal to children.

The real time feedback will give both audio and graphic clues about the quality of the tracing and will adjust with difficulty level.
Our ABC and 123 tracing evaluation algorithms allow for an accurate and fun reward, using a 5 star rating for each exercise. This engages and motivates the kids to progress and to strive for more.

DESIGNED for KIDS

‚Ä¢ No irritating pop-ups.
‚Ä¢ No collection of personal data
‚Ä¢ Game settings are behind a parental gate. This can be enabled, and ensures a child to work with a certain font, formation rule, difficulty level and various other features for total specification to their needs.
‚Ä¢ This game can be useful for kids with autism, adhd, dyslexia or dysgraphia conditions.

A perfect educational game for kids to learn handwriting with ABCs and 123s either in kindergarten, pre-school, home-school, primary school or using Montessori method.

comments: Love this game! Think this game was made for me. Love the game, love the music. Most other games like this, you play have you race the clock. That is way too much much stress for me. I needed a game like this, that helps me get my mind off my crazy days. With everything else going on in this crazy world, this is my one go to I can take a few minutes to myself and just enjoy. Thank you.

Love it..........might be like cartoons but that is no problem with me. As I go on I understand the pictures will change. Give it a chance....you will love it. Thanks to all involved in putting together this app. Good Job. Keep up the goo

I LOVE this game!! If you enjoy these types of games I HIGHLY recommend downloading this. You get unlimited hints!! Plus you don't have to be connected to the internet to play this so no waisting data if you don't have wifi!! I've always been intrigued by games like this. I wanted to wait until I got along further in the game to comment my honest reply. I'm currently on level 331. At first yes it's VERY EASY, but as it goes on the levels do get harder, but the hints are very helpful!!
Love it.... it's fun and keeps you on your feet to find the items. And I try to keep up with the time they show on each game.

This is really a fantastic game. It is like a brain exercise and it also improves our reasoning abilities. It have 781 level and I involve 300 out of them these all are very interesting and mind blowing. I won gold medals in 150 and silver medal in 100 and bronze medal in 50 levels. I really thanx to developer. It is doing grt job noo prblm is here in game . It is really grtt.... Thank you for this üòäüòäüëçüëç

comments: The game was amazing. But when I hit level 12 it did not let me go to the next level. I played level 12 about 5 times. It only let me play levels 1-12. Then it said that I have to rate the game. When I rated the game, I went to the game to play again. But it said I have to rate but I already did. So I deleted the review and decided to write a really mean review. IF YOU WILL REGET IT. PLEASE DO NOT GET THE GAME.

At first this game was really fun, but then when i finished level 12 it asked me to rate it and there was no "later" option as there usually is so i rated the game and when i got back to the game to continue playing, i had to do the level all over again, so i did, and then the same thing happened after i finished the level for the second time. I am so angry. Defenitly deleting the game.

I love this game. Because of quarantine I have a lot of free time and this game helps m kill that time. I love that the ads are somewhat limited. The only thing I don't like is that is makes you watch an ad when you got the help buttun. Would definitely recommend üòâ

Really good game. Excellent puzzles to solve 'em swiftly. So many details, so many colors and numbers. That's fine. Grafphic is 4/5, can be better, but that's ok. It is really funny to solve so many puzzles. But actually, there' re too less rooms, only 12. Am waiting for the next upd.

This is game is fun! Why? -because you can use your minds to solve many things and can play this game offline! What do you learn from it? -you learn many ways on life basics especially on how to do something or try to escape something. You learn many things and also this game helps you revise on what you do at school like knowing the numbers on the clock or auditioning number combinations you unlock this draw! You must download this app !

title: Crazy Cursive Letters
description:
Crazy Cursive Letters allows you to practice cursive (joined up), letter and word forming and have fun! A new crazy character/ scene is unlocked with every 4 words written correctly. 

Features include;
* Choice of cursive style letter e.g. two styles of the letter r.
* Personalised feedback to tell kids which letters they are totally awesome at and which letters they could focus on practising.
* Practice of single letters in cursive style.
* The 100 most frequent words to try in cursive style.
* Multiple Players, useful to track the progress of siblings or of up to 10 players in a class.
* 'My Words', section where you could type in the weeks spellings to practice.
* A phonics based approach supporting the writing practice.
* Left / right handed adaptation
* You can also use Crazy Cursive to help learn a new language! Select from American English, UK English, French, German, Italian or Spanish words and phonics. 

Your child can practice writing the top 100 words in cursive style and can also type in their own words to practice. Letters are sounded out phonetically to allow your child to develop skills of breaking down words which is particularly useful for children with Dyslexia. 

Thank you to the Teachers, Children and Parents of Fairlawn School London for your support and feedback. Special thanks to Fairlawn Teachers for being inspiringly Crazy for Cursive!

10 Benefits of Teaching Cursive Handwriting 

1.Relative ease in introducing cursive penmanship to preschoolers. 
2.Prevents reversals and confusion of letters 
3.Enhances spelling ability 
4.Develops internal control systems that can be used as tool for learning 
5.Potential for errors are diminished 
6.Improved reading skills 
7.Enforces the skills for patterns in reading and writing 
8. Prevents erratic spaces between letters and words 
9. Helps Left Handed Children 
10.Use as a tool to put thoughts on paper quickly and easily 

Conclusion: 
We should teach our children ‚ÄòCursive First, Print Later‚Äô. 

Source: Samuel L. Blumenfield, "How Should We Teach Our Children to Write? Cursive First, Print Later!" 

The British Dyslexia association recommend that children learn the continuous cursive style. The cursive style has some significant advantages for Dyslexic students. The key advantages to this system are: 

* By making each letter in one movement, children‚Äôs hands develop a ‚Äòphysical memory‚Äô of it, making it easier to produce the correct shape; 

* Because letters and words flow from left to right, children are less likely to reverse letters which are typically difficult (like b/d or p/q); 

* There is a clearer distinction between capital letters and lower case; 

* The continuous flow of writing ultimately improves speed and spelling.

title: Prosodiya - Lesen und Schreiben lernen (Deutsch)
description:
Prosodiya ist ein innovatives F√∂rderkonzept zur Verbesserung der Lese- und Rechtschreibleistung von Grundschulkindern mit und ohne LRS.

Mit Prosodiya trainieren Kinder den deutschen Sprachrhythmus Schritt f√ºr Schritt zu erkennen. Sie √ºben einzelne W√∂rter in Silben einzuteilen und die betonte Silbe zu erkennen. Anschlie√üend lernen sie, wie sie diese sprachrhythmischen Merkmale mit Rechtschreibregeln verbinden k√∂nnen. Mit Hilfe dieser F√§higkeiten werden die Kinder in die Lage versetzt, systematischer und leichter Lesen und Schreiben zu lernen.

Inhalte
- √úber 400 der wichtigsten W√∂rter des deutschen Grundwortschatzes
- Bildliche Darstellung aller W√∂rter f√ºr einen besseren Lerneffekt
- Kindergerechte und verst√§ndliche Mitmach-Erkl√§rungen der Lernstrategien und Aufgaben
- Kinder k√∂nnen Prosodiya eigenst√§ndig ohne Hilfe von Eltern nutzen
- Spannende Hintergrundgeschichte mit vielen fesselnden Bildern aus der Fantasiewelt Prosodiya 

Ziele
- Betonungsmuster und Silbengrenzen erkennen
- Offene Silben (lange Vokale) und geschlossene Silben (kurze Vokale) erkennen und verstehen
- Konsonantenverdoppelungen wie pp, tt, mm, ck, tz und Dehnungszeichen wie ie, stummes h erkennen und verstehen
- W√∂rter mit Hilfe der gelernten Merkmale richtig schreiben
- Kontinuierliche Anpassung an den individuellen Leistungsstand jedes Kindes

Zielgruppe
Der Inhalt von Prosodiya ist an den meisten Grundschulen Inhalt der 2. und 3. Klasse. Das F√∂rderprogramm ist jedoch auch f√ºr Kinder h√∂herer Klassenstufen mit Lese- und Rechtschreibproblemen geeignet. 

Trainingsempfehlung
- 15 bis 20 Minuten pro Tag
- 4 bis 5 Trainingstage pro Woche
- Die Gesamttrainingsdauer bel√§uft sich auf mindestens 8 Wochen. Durch die kontinuierliche Anpassung wiederholen schwache Kinder mehr und trainieren damit √ºber einen l√§ngeren Zeitraum.

Auszeichnungen
Prosodiya erhielt den European Serious Game Award auf der Games and Learning Alliance Konferenz 2017 in Lissabon. 

F√∂rderungen
-EXIST-Gr√ºndungsstipendium des Bundesministeriums f√ºr Wirtschaft und Engerie
-Digital Content Fund der Medien- und Filmgesellschaft Baden-W√ºrttemberg

Ergebnis wissenschaftlicher Forschung
Bereits 2009 begann Dr. Katharina Brandelik damit zu untersuchen, ob ein Zusammenhang zwischen den sprachrhythmischen F√§higkeiten und den Lese-Rechtschreibf√§higkeiten von Kindern besteht. Im Rahmen ihrer Dissertation an der Universit√§t T√ºbingen konnte sie zeigen, dass Kinder mit Lese-Rechtschreibschw√§che h√§ufig Probleme bei der Wahrnehmung des Sprachrhythmus haben. Hierf√ºr erhielt Frau Dr. Brandelik 2014 den Wissenschaftspreis des Bundesverbandes f√ºr Legasthenie und Dyskalkulie e. V. 
Basierend auf diesen Erkenntnissen wurde in 2014 mit der Entwicklung des Prosodiya-F√∂rderprogramms begonnen. Seit Beginn erfolgt die Entwicklung in Kooperation mit der Universit√§t T√ºbingen, Prof. Dr. J√ºrgen Heller, Forschungsmethoden und Mathematische Psychologie und Prof. Dr. Detmar Meurers, Computer Lingustik sowie dem Lernforum Brandelik, einem Nachhilfe- und Lerntherapieanbieter. Inzwischen besteht die Prosodiya-Forschungsgruppe aus Dr. Katharina Brandelik, Jochen Brandelik, Heiko Holz und Benedikt Beuttler. 

Heiko Holz hat 2018 eine Prosodiya-F√∂rderstudie im Rahmen der Graduiertenschule & Forschungsnetzwerks LEAD durchf√ºhrt. Es haben 129 Grundschulkinder der zweiten bis vierten Klasse teilgenommen und √ºber 9 Wochen ca. 5-mal pro Woche f√ºr je 20 Minuten mit Prosodiya trainiert. Die Kindern wurden in zwei Gruppen aufgeteilt und die Gruppen haben Zeit versetzt trainiert, ein sogenanntes Warte-Kontrollgruppen-Design.  An je 3 Terminen wurden die Rechtschreibleistungen sowie die F√§higkeit, Betonungsmuster wahrzunehmen, √ºberpr√ºft. Die Ergebnisse der Studie legen nahe, dass die Kinder durch das Training mit der Prosodiya-App sowohl ihre Rechtschreibleistung als auch ihre Betonungswahrnehmung deutlich verbessern konnten.

Mehr Informationen finden Sie unter https://prosodiya.de

title: Logical test - IQ
description:
Test your logic and your intelligence with these varied tests, similar to those to calculate an IQ (Intelligence quotient) with logical sequences of : 
- Numbers
- Letters
- Dominos
- Figures
- Etc....
 
Training mode :
There are 10 questions by test. For every question, you have 60 seconds to answer.
If a test is interrupted, it can be continued later.
At the end of a test, a grade is given to you.

Competition mode :
Answer as many questions as you can!
You will be rewarded by : 
- 10 points per question if the answer is correct
- From 0 to 10 more points if you answer quickly

Multiplayer mode (NEW!):
Play realtime against other players.
5 questions to answer within 80 seconds.
The more you answer quickly, the more you gain points!

Useful to train yourself to hiring processes or school exams, recruitment, Psycho-technical tests, series, logic puzzles, aptitude test, riddles, competitive exam, admission, logical reasoning

title: Talking Book Bangla
description:
Talking Book Bangla is a free online library service available to the blind, low vision and suffering from Dyslexia makes it difficult to read regular print. The TBB has access to Audio and Unicode Text book, BCS guide, Al-Quran, Al-Hadith, Islamic book and magazine in digital format. Readers with visual impairment, blindness or Persons suffering from Dyslexia are able to listen and download independently in a format most comfortable to them using this Apps. Books downloaded totally Free of cost.

This initiative supported by Visually Impaired Education and Welfare Foundation (VIEW Foundation); non-profit, non-political and Voluntary Welfare service agency.
http://www.viewfoundationbd.org

This system developed by Innovation Garage Limited; Accessible technology develop based Company.
http://www.innovationgaragebd.com

T. A. M. Ragib Shahriar

title: My Home Design - Modern City
description:
Welcome to Modern City! Your new favorite home design game set against a stunning NYC background.

Take this chance to work side by side with star interior designer Chloe Williams and her business partner Liam Gold. From successful career women to newlywed couples to families, clients are on their way to meet Chloe and Liam right now!

Help them design trendy kitchens, cozy living rooms, relaxing bedrooms and more to live the life of their dreams! Solve fun match-3 puzzles to collect coins and use them to select furniture, decor items and more! These lucky clients have very different personalities, needs and ideas but they have one thing in common: They all have high expectations for you to design an amazing home! Can you help them create spaces to relax, enjoy and spend quality time? Because after all a house without character is just a house. Help your clients to turn these houses into sweet designer homes.

It's not going to be easy. You'll have to work and play your way up from the bottom, makeover different rooms and places to become a real designer and put a smile on your clients' faces. Do you have what it takes to remodel, decorate and furbish dream homes and become a household name in the home design game world?

Here's how to do it:

üõ†Ô∏è Meet interior designer Chloe and Liam. Couples, singles and families, all kinds of clients are waiting for you!

üõ†Ô∏è Design, renovate, remodel kitchens, living rooms, bedrooms and more in Modern City! Choose furniture and decor according to your style and preferences. Simply tap to decorate and create trendy places in the city.

üõ†Ô∏è Exciting and addictive Match-3 puzzle games! Play puzzles to collect coins and use them to create your perfect home design!

üõ†Ô∏è Enjoy witty and fun conversations among interior designers and clients!

üõ†Ô∏è Express yourself and nurture your interior design skills! Plus, find inspiration for your own home makeover!

üõ†Ô∏è Play for free and offline!

üõ†Ô∏è New episodes and match-3 puzzle levels coming out soon!

Are you into the city life? Guam, Hawaii and the Caribbean won't do the trick for you? Come to NYC and play Modern City! Find inspiration, collect high-quality furniture, and decorate with enchanting colors and patterns. Build and design homes and make dreams come true in this match-3 puzzle and home design game! Create a home you'll never want to leave! üè°



*Please note that [ Modern City ] saves your progress on your device. Data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.*

------------------------------------------------

‚ú®DEVELOPER INFO‚ú®

Are you into home design? Puzzle games? CookApps Playgrounds fan?

Join us on Facebook for fun stuff and news about your favorite games!

https://www.facebook.com/PlaygroundsTeam/

comments: Was a great game until the developers doubled the ad content. Not only that, but now the game is freezing after I make my final move to win the level, especially if I use a rainbow ball. If I use a rainbow ball in conjunction with another booster, regardless of what part of the level I'm at, the game freaks out and closes. When it does this, I have to redo the level again. If this continues, I will uninstall and reflect this in an update.

I like this game because it is very relaxing. I also love the choices it gives you to work with. I personally love modern i think it is a cozy and cute inviorment to live in. I also love the matching game it gives you a way to get money. It is like a win win because you get to design and you get to match and overall i think this game is very good and that is why i gave it a five and if i had one complant it would be for a little bit more choices for the fashion sence. I will have my friends play

Stupid & FULL OF ADS. Initially it was pretty good with not many ads. Now it's gotten so bad that there's not just 1 30+ second ad after every game, but 2 or even 3! It is beyond ridiculous how many ads you're forced to sit through in this game. On another note, it annoys me how the characters have been portrayed. The man looks strong and composed, hands folded across his chest. The woman, meanwhile, always has her mouth open, head bobbing, eyes squinting, looking like a silly child-like bimbo.

I like this game because its direct. I mean other renovating games they ask us to earn stars to complete tasks. And those tasks include stupid ones like call a person, look under the bed, etc. But this only involves renovating and nothing else. No wasting time in listening to the people talking. I hate matching games but I'm putting up with it just because o this game is direct. I simply want a renovating game which doesn't have matching games, which doesn't have any stupid tasks and less talk

I like this game because its quick. The graphics are good (not tiny little triangles squares and circles) Also you don't have to play loads of games to get furniture. The prices are pretty reasonable.so you get through rooms quicker

title: My Story: Choose Your Own Path
description:
üéâ Choose hours of fun with My Story: Choose Your Own Path! üéâ

This interactive storytelling game allows you to make your own decisions and impact the story with your choices. Whether you enjoy drama, romance, comedy or fantasy, in My Story, you are the one that gets to control what happens next. 

Choose a story genre and experience amazing adventures in the world of My Story! Choose a story and let the entertainment begin! Whatever you want to do, you can. 

üíÑRoleplay as a young fashion icon in Model Undercover and make important decisions for her career; take part in a dating show and find a perfect match in Who Wants to Marry Miss Larson?; or just go for some good old high school drama in our famous story, Love, Mona. üíÑ

My Story library offers a variety of fun stories! The choice of genre and story is entirely yours, but the fun is guaranteed!

‚ùóMake important decisions and change the narrative. In this fun interactive game, you can choose your own path and change the course of the story. The outcome of future chapters is entirely in your hands. Who will you choose to trust in Mortal Frenemy? How will you handle your magical new life in The Bitten Ones? Do your best to avoid the drama, or choose to confront anyone that stands in your way‚Ä¶ 
Why wait a week for the next episode of a TV series when you can find quality entertainment right here? ‚ùó

üíïStep up your dating game and control what happens in your love life. Dress up in an outfit that will impress your crush and maybe even get you a date. 
Romance is everywhere in My Story ‚Äì from high school crushes in Dear Mona to adult relationship drama in Bad Judgement. Go all out and spice up your love life with some seductive lingerie. Choose the most romantic path, create unforgettable moments with your favorite characters, and enjoy your love story!üíï

üíÉLooking for a book series that will give you more fun moments? You will love the Mona series! 
‚Ä¢	Start with Dear Mona ‚Äì After your first love story finishes mere moments after it started, you are left heartbroken. Few years later, you find yourself falling in love with Shawn, a bad boy with a good heart. However, when your old love returns, you need to make some difficult choices. How will your love story end?
‚Ä¢	After Dear Mona, make your way through the chapters of Love, Mona ‚Äì Follow Mona‚Äôs story from her high school days to adulthood. Navigate through teen crushes, enjoy the college parties, have adventures in Europe and much more. Enjoy the romance, live through the drama, and, in the most difficult moments, help Mona make her decisions. üíÉ

üíå For more intriguing love stories, check out Forbidden Fruit and The Billionaire‚Äôs Darling. 
‚Ä¢	Forbidden Fruit ‚Äì A night out is just what you needed to get your mind off of college, and that good-looking guy by the bar will make it even better. Too bad he‚Äôs your chemistry professor‚Ä¶ What will your decision be? Will you choose to pursue a romance with him or will you find another guy to date? How will you handle the drama that comes with dating your college professor? It‚Äôs really quite an unconventional love story‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢	The Billionaire‚Äôs Darling ‚Äì A handsome billionaire has his eye on you, a simple college girl? Sounds like every girl‚Äôs fantasy. But, when he makes you a strange offer, what path will you choose? And, what will happen when your fake romance starts turning into a real love story? Will you and Henry get through the drama and maintain your love for each other? üíå
 
My Story: Choose Your Own Path is constantly working on producing the most thrilling stories, getting the best authors on board, and creating an unforgettable reading experience for each reader. Our library has a story for every reader. 

Download My Story: Choose Your Own Path, and start shaping your own story!
